77//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
78static inline Bool isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff()
79{
80 return (TheGameLogic && TheGameLogic->isInGameLogicUpdate()) ||
81 (TheGameState && TheGameState->isInLoadGame());
82}

88#if defined(DEBUG_CRC) && (defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL))
89#include <cstdarg>
90class LogClass
91{
92public:
93 LogClass(const char *fname);
94 ~LogClass();
95 void log(const char *fmt, ...);
96 void dumpMatrix3D(const Matrix3D *m, AsciiString name, AsciiString fname, Int line);
97 void dumpReal(Real r, AsciiString name, AsciiString fname, Int line);
98
99protected:
100 FILE *m_fp;
101};
102
103LogClass::LogClass(const char *fname)
104{
105 char buffer[ _MAX_PATH ];
106 GetModuleFileName( NULL, buffer, sizeof( buffer ) );
107 char *pEnd = buffer + strlen( buffer );
108 while( pEnd != buffer )
109 {
110 if( *pEnd == '\\' )
111 {
112 *pEnd = 0;
113 break;
114 }
115 pEnd--;
116 }
117 AsciiString fullPath;
118 fullPath.format("%s\\%s", buffer, fname);
119 m_fp = fopen(fullPath.str(), "wt");
120}
121
122LogClass::~LogClass()
123{
124 if (m_fp)
125 {
126 fclose(m_fp);
127 }
128}
129
130void LogClass::log(const char *fmt, ...)
131{
132 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff(), ("Calc'ing logic bone pos in client!!!"));
133 if (!m_fp /*|| !isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff()*/)
134 return;
135 static char buf[1024];
136 static Int lastFrame = 0;
137 static Int lastIndex = 0;
138 if (lastFrame != TheGameLogic->getFrame())
139 {
140 lastFrame = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
141 lastIndex = 0;
142 }
143
144 va_list va;
145 va_start( va, fmt );
146 _vsnprintf(buf, 1024, fmt, va );
147 buf[1023] = 0;
148 va_end( va );
149
150 char *tmp = buf;
151 while (tmp && *tmp)
152 {
153 if (*tmp == '\r' || *tmp == '\n')
154 {
155 *tmp = ' ';
156 }
157 ++tmp;
158 }
159
160 fprintf(m_fp, "%d:%d %s\n", lastFrame, lastIndex++, buf);
161 fflush(m_fp);
162}
163
164void LogClass::dumpMatrix3D(const Matrix3D *m, AsciiString name, AsciiString fname, Int line)
165{
166 fname.toLower();
167 fname = fname.reverseFind('\\') + 1;
168 const Real *matrix = (const Real *)m;
169 log("dumpMatrix3D() %s:%d %s\n",
170 fname.str(), line, name.str());
171 for (Int i=0; i<3; ++i)
172 log(" 0x%08X 0x%08X 0x%08X 0x%08X\n",
173 AS_INT(matrix[(i<<2)+0]), AS_INT(matrix[(i<<2)+1]), AS_INT(matrix[(i<<2)+2]), AS_INT(matrix[(i<<2)+3]));
174}
175
176void LogClass::dumpReal(Real r, AsciiString name, AsciiString fname, Int line)
177{
178 if (!m_fp || !isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff())
179 return;
180 fname.toLower();
181 fname = fname.reverseFind('\\') + 1;
182 log("dumpReal() %s:%d %s %8.8X (%f)\n",
183 fname.str(), line, name.str(), AS_INT(r), r);
184}

186LogClass BonePosLog("bonePositions.txt");
187
188#define BONEPOS_LOG(x) BonePosLog.log x
189#define BONEPOS_DUMPMATRIX3D(x) BONEPOS_DUMPMATRIX3DNAMED(x, #x)
190#define BONEPOS_DUMPMATRIX3DNAMED(x, y) BonePosLog.dumpMatrix3D(x, y, __FILE__, __LINE__)
191#define BONEPOS_DUMPREAL(x) BONEPOS_DUMPREALNAMED(x, #x)
192#define BONEPOS_DUMPREALNAMED(x, y) BonePosLog.dumpReal(x, y, __FILE__, __LINE__)

194#else // DEBUG_CRC

198#define BONEPOS_DUMPMATRIX3DNAMED(x, y) {}
199#define BONEPOS_DUMPREAL(x) {}
200#define BONEPOS_DUMPREALNAMED(x, y) {}

202#endif // DEBUG_CRC

213// flags that aren't read directly from INI, but set in response to various other situations
214enum INIReadFlagsType
215{
216 ANIMS_COPIED_FROM_DEFAULT_STATE = 0,
217 GOT_NONIDLE_ANIMS,
218 GOT_IDLE_ANIMS,
219};
220
221enum ACBits
222{
223 RANDOMIZE_START_FRAME = 0,
224 START_FRAME_FIRST,
225 START_FRAME_LAST,
226 ADJUST_HEIGHT_BY_CONSTRUCTION_PERCENT,
227 PRISTINE_BONE_POS_IN_FINAL_FRAME,
228 MAINTAIN_FRAME_ACROSS_STATES,
229 RESTART_ANIM_WHEN_COMPLETE,
230 MAINTAIN_FRAME_ACROSS_STATES2,
231 MAINTAIN_FRAME_ACROSS_STATES3,
232 MAINTAIN_FRAME_ACROSS_STATES4,
233};
234
235static const char *ACBitsNames[] =
236{
237 "RANDOMSTART",
238 "START_FRAME_FIRST",
239 "START_FRAME_LAST",
240 "ADJUST_HEIGHT_BY_CONSTRUCTION_PERCENT",
241 "PRISTINE_BONE_POS_IN_FINAL_FRAME",
242 "MAINTAIN_FRAME_ACROSS_STATES",
243 "RESTART_ANIM_WHEN_COMPLETE",
244 "MAINTAIN_FRAME_ACROSS_STATES2",
245 "MAINTAIN_FRAME_ACROSS_STATES3",
246 "MAINTAIN_FRAME_ACROSS_STATES4",
247
248 NULL
249};
250
251static const Int ALL_MAINTAIN_FRAME_FLAGS =
252 (1<<MAINTAIN_FRAME_ACROSS_STATES) |
253 (1<<MAINTAIN_FRAME_ACROSS_STATES2) |
254 (1<<MAINTAIN_FRAME_ACROSS_STATES3) |
255 (1<<MAINTAIN_FRAME_ACROSS_STATES4);
256
257inline Bool isAnyMaintainFrameFlagSet(Int flags)
258{
259 return (flags & ALL_MAINTAIN_FRAME_FLAGS) != 0;
260}
261
262inline Bool isCommonMaintainFrameFlagSet(Int a, Int b)
263{
264 a &= ALL_MAINTAIN_FRAME_FLAGS;
265 b &= ALL_MAINTAIN_FRAME_FLAGS;
266 return (a & b) != 0;
267}

295//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
296W3DAnimationInfo::W3DAnimationInfo(const AsciiString& name, Bool isIdle, Real distanceCovered) :
297#ifdef RETAIN_ANIM_HANDLES
298 m_handle(NULL),
299 m_naturalDurationInMsec(0),
300#else
301 m_naturalDurationInMsec(-1),
302#endif
303 m_name(name),
304 m_isIdleAnim(isIdle),
305 m_distanceCovered(distanceCovered)
306{
307}
308
309//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
310W3DAnimationInfo::W3DAnimationInfo( const W3DAnimationInfo &r ) :
311 m_name(r.m_name),
312#ifdef RETAIN_ANIM_HANDLES
313 m_handle(r.m_handle),
314#endif
315 m_distanceCovered(r.m_distanceCovered),
316 m_isIdleAnim(r.m_isIdleAnim),
317 m_naturalDurationInMsec(r.m_naturalDurationInMsec)
318{
319#ifdef RETAIN_ANIM_HANDLES
320 if (m_handle)
321 m_handle->Add_Ref();
322#endif
323}
324
325//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
326W3DAnimationInfo& W3DAnimationInfo::operator=(const W3DAnimationInfo &r)
327{
328 m_name = r.m_name;
329 m_distanceCovered = r.m_distanceCovered;
330 m_naturalDurationInMsec = r.m_naturalDurationInMsec;
331 m_isIdleAnim = r.m_isIdleAnim;
332
333#ifdef RETAIN_ANIM_HANDLES
334 REF_PTR_RELEASE(m_handle);
335 m_handle = r.m_handle;
336 if (m_handle)
337 m_handle->Add_Ref();
338#endif
339
340 return (*this);
341}

344//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
345// note that this now returns an ADDREFED handle, which must be released by the caller!
346HAnimClass* W3DAnimationInfo::getAnimHandle() const
347{
348#ifdef RETAIN_ANIM_HANDLES
349 if (m_handle == NULL)
350 {
351 // Get_HAnim addrefs it, so we'll have to release it in our dtor.
352 m_handle = W3DDisplay::m_assetManager->Get_HAnim(m_name.str());
353 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(m_handle, ("*** ASSET ERROR: animation %s not found\n",m_name.str()));
354 if (m_handle)
355 {
356 m_naturalDurationInMsec = m_handle->Get_Num_Frames() * 1000.0f / m_handle->Get_Frame_Rate();
357 }
358 }
359 // since we have it locally, must addref.
360 if (m_handle)
361 m_handle->Add_Ref();
362 return m_handle;
363#else
364 HAnimClass* handle = W3DDisplay::m_assetManager->Get_HAnim(m_name.str());
365 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(handle, ("*** ASSET ERROR: animation %s not found\n",m_name.str()));
366 if (handle != NULL && m_naturalDurationInMsec < 0)
367 {
368 m_naturalDurationInMsec = handle->Get_Num_Frames() * 1000.0f / handle->Get_Frame_Rate();
369 }
370 // since Get_HAnim() returns an addrefed handle, we must NOT addref here.
371 //if (handle)
372 // handle->Add_Ref();
373 return handle;
374#endif
375}
376
377//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
378W3DAnimationInfo::~W3DAnimationInfo()
379{
380#ifdef RETAIN_ANIM_HANDLES
381 REF_PTR_RELEASE(m_handle);
382 m_handle = NULL;
383#endif
384}

402//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
403void ModelConditionInfo::addPublicBone(const AsciiString& boneName) const
404{
405 if (boneName.isEmpty() || boneName.isNone())
406 return;
407
408 AsciiString tmp = boneName;
409 tmp.toLower();
410 if (std::find(m_publicBones.begin(), m_publicBones.end(), tmp) == m_publicBones.end())
411 {
412 m_publicBones.push_back(tmp);
413 }
414}
415
416//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
417Bool ModelConditionInfo::matchesMode(Bool night, Bool snowy) const
418{
419 for (std::vector<ModelConditionFlags>::const_iterator it = m_conditionsYesVec.begin();
420 it != m_conditionsYesVec.end();
421 ++it)
422 {
423 if (it->test(MODELCONDITION_NIGHT) == (night) &&
424 it->test(MODELCONDITION_SNOW) == (snowy))
425 {
426 return true;
427 }
428 }
429 return false;
430}
431
432//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
433inline Bool testFlagBit(Int flags, Int bit)
434{
435 return (flags & (1<<bit)) != 0;
436}

438//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
439static Bool findSingleBone(RenderObjClass* robj, const AsciiString& boneName, Matrix3D& mtx, Int& boneIndex)
440{
441 if (boneName.isNone() || boneName.isEmpty())
442 return false;
443
444 boneIndex = robj->Get_Bone_Index(boneName.str());
445 if (boneIndex != 0)
446 {
447 mtx = robj->Get_Bone_Transform(boneIndex);
448 return true;
449 }
450 else
451 {
452 return false;
453 }
454}
455
456//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
457static Bool findSingleSubObj(RenderObjClass* robj, const AsciiString& boneName, Matrix3D& mtx, Int& boneIndex)
458{
459 if (boneName.isNone() || boneName.isEmpty())
460 return false;
461
462 RenderObjClass* childObject = robj->Get_Sub_Object_By_Name(boneName.str());
463 if (childObject)
464 {
465 mtx = childObject->Get_Transform();
466
467 // you'd think this would work, but, it does not. do it the hard way.
468 // boneIndex = childObject->Get_Sub_Object_Bone_Index(childObject);
469
470 for (Int subObj = 0; subObj < robj->Get_Num_Sub_Objects(); subObj++)
471 {
472 RenderObjClass* test = robj->Get_Sub_Object(subObj);
473 if (test == childObject)
474 {
475 boneIndex = robj->Get_Sub_Object_Bone_Index(0, subObj);
476#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
477 test->Release_Ref();
478 test = robj->Get_Sub_Object_On_Bone(0, boneIndex);
479 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(test != NULL && test == childObject, ("*** ASSET ERROR: Hmm, bone problem"));
480#endif
481 }
482 if (test) test->Release_Ref();
483 }
484
485 childObject->Release_Ref();
486
487 return true;
488 }
489 else
490 {
491 return false;
492 }
493}
494
495//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
496static Bool doSingleBoneName(RenderObjClass* robj, const AsciiString& boneName, PristineBoneInfoMap& map)
497{
498 Bool foundAsBone = false;
499 Bool foundAsSubObj = false;
500
501 PristineBoneInfo info;
502 AsciiString tmp;
503
504 AsciiString boneNameTmp = boneName;
505 boneNameTmp.toLower(); // convert to all-lowercase to avoid case sens issues later
506
507 setFPMode();
508
509 if (findSingleBone(robj, boneNameTmp, info.mtx, info.boneIndex))
510 {
511//DEBUG_LOG(("added bone %s\n",boneNameTmp.str()));
512 BONEPOS_LOG(("Caching bone %s (index %d)\n", boneNameTmp.str(), info.boneIndex));
513 BONEPOS_DUMPMATRIX3D(&(info.mtx));
514
515 map[NAMEKEY(boneNameTmp)] = info;
516 foundAsBone = true;
517 }
518
519 for (Int i = 1; i <= 99; ++i)
520 {
521 tmp.format("%s%02d", boneNameTmp.str(), i);
522 if (findSingleBone(robj, tmp, info.mtx, info.boneIndex))
523 {
524//DEBUG_LOG(("added bone %s\n",tmp.str()));
525 BONEPOS_LOG(("Caching bone %s (index %d)\n", tmp.str(), info.boneIndex));
526 BONEPOS_DUMPMATRIX3D(&(info.mtx));
527 map[NAMEKEY(tmp)] = info;
528 foundAsBone = true;
529 }
530 else
531 {
532 break;
533 }
534 }
535
536 if (!foundAsBone)
537 {
538 if (findSingleSubObj(robj, boneNameTmp, info.mtx, info.boneIndex))
539 {
540//DEBUG_LOG(("added subobj %s\n",boneNameTmp.str()));
541 BONEPOS_LOG(("Caching bone from subobject %s (index %d)\n", boneNameTmp.str(), info.boneIndex));
542 BONEPOS_DUMPMATRIX3D(&(info.mtx));
543 map[NAMEKEY(boneNameTmp)] = info;
544 foundAsSubObj = true;
545 }
546
547 for (Int i = 1; i <= 99; ++i)
548 {
549 tmp.format("%s%02d", boneNameTmp.str(), i);
550 if (findSingleSubObj(robj, tmp, info.mtx, info.boneIndex))
551 {
552//DEBUG_LOG(("added subobj %s\n",tmp.str()));
553 BONEPOS_LOG(("Caching bone from subobject %s (index %d)\n", tmp.str(), info.boneIndex));
554 BONEPOS_DUMPMATRIX3D(&(info.mtx));
555 map[NAMEKEY(tmp)] = info;
556 foundAsSubObj = true;
557 }
558 else
559 {
560 break;
561 }
562 }
563 }
564
565 return foundAsBone || foundAsSubObj;
566}

568//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
569void ModelConditionInfo::validateStuff(RenderObjClass* robj, Real scale, const std::vector<AsciiString>& extraPublicBones) const
570{
571// srj sez: hm, this doesn't make sense; I think we really do need to validate transition states.
572// if (m_transition != NO_TRANSITION)
573// return;
574
575 loadAnimations();
576 if (!(m_validStuff & PUBLIC_BONES_VALID) && isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff())
577 {
578 for (std::vector<AsciiString>::const_iterator bone_it = extraPublicBones.begin(); bone_it != extraPublicBones.end(); ++bone_it)
579 {
580 addPublicBone(*bone_it);
581 }
582 m_validStuff |= PUBLIC_BONES_VALID;
583 }
584 validateCachedBones(robj, scale);
585 validateTurretInfo();
586 validateWeaponBarrelInfo();
587}
588
589//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
590void ModelConditionInfo::validateCachedBones(RenderObjClass* robj, Real scale) const
591{
592 //DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff(), ("calling validateCachedBones() from in GameClient!"));
593 if (m_validStuff & PRISTINE_BONES_VALID)
594 return;
595
596 if (!isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff())
597 {
598 m_pristineBones.clear();
599 m_validStuff &= ~PRISTINE_BONES_VALID;
600 return;
601 }
602
603 setFPMode();
604
605 BONEPOS_LOG(("Validating bones for %s: %s", m_modelName.str(), getDescription().str()));
606 //BONEPOS_LOG(("Passing in valid render obj: %d\n", (robj != 0)));
607 BONEPOS_DUMPREAL(scale);
608
609 m_pristineBones.clear();
610
611 // go ahead and set this here, in case we return early.
612 m_validStuff |= PRISTINE_BONES_VALID;
613
614 Bool tossRobj = false;
615 if (robj == NULL)
616 {
617 if (m_modelName.isEmpty())
618 {
619 //BONEPOS_LOG(("Bailing: model name is empty\n"));
620 return;
621 }
622
623 robj = W3DDisplay::m_assetManager->Create_Render_Obj(m_modelName.str(), scale, 0);
624 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(robj, ("*** ASSET ERROR: Model %s not found!\n",m_modelName.str()));
625 if (!robj)
626 {
627 //BONEPOS_LOG(("Bailing: could not load render object\n"));
628 return;
629 }
630 tossRobj = true;
631 }
632
633 Matrix3D originalTransform = robj->Get_Transform(); // save the transform
634 HLodClass* hlod = NULL;
635 HAnimClass* curAnim = NULL;
636 int numFrames = 0;
637 float frame = 0.0f;
638 int mode = 0;
639 float mult = 1.0f;
640
641 if (robj->Class_ID() == RenderObjClass::CLASSID_HLOD)
642 {
643 hlod = (HLodClass*)robj;
644 curAnim = hlod->Peek_Animation_And_Info(frame, numFrames, mode, mult);
645 }
646
647 // if we have any animations in this state, always choose the first, since the animations
648 // vary on a per-client basis.
649 HAnimClass* animToUse;
650 if (m_animations.size() > 0)
651 {
652 animToUse = m_animations.front().getAnimHandle(); // return an AddRef'ed handle
653 }
654 else
655 {
656 animToUse = curAnim; // Peek_Animation_And_Info does not addref, so we must do so here
657 if (animToUse)
658 animToUse->Add_Ref();
659 }
660 if (animToUse != NULL)
661 {
662 // make sure we're in frame zero.
663 Int whichFrame = testFlagBit(m_flags, PRISTINE_BONE_POS_IN_FINAL_FRAME) ? animToUse->Get_Num_Frames()-1 : 0;
664 robj->Set_Animation(animToUse, whichFrame, RenderObjClass::ANIM_MODE_MANUAL);
665 // must balance the addref, above
666 REF_PTR_RELEASE(animToUse);
667 animToUse = NULL;
668 }
669
670 Matrix3D tmp(true);
671 tmp.Scale(scale);
672 robj->Set_Transform(tmp); // set to identity transform
673
674 if (TheGlobalData)
675 {
676 for (std::vector<AsciiString>::const_iterator it = TheGlobalData->m_standardPublicBones.begin(); it != TheGlobalData->m_standardPublicBones.end(); ++it)
677 {
678 if (!doSingleBoneName(robj, *it, m_pristineBones))
679 {
680 // don't crash here, since these are catch-all global bones and won't be present in most models.
681 //DEBUG_CRASH(("public bone %s (and variations thereof) not found in model %s!\n",it->str(),m_modelName.str()));
682 }
683 //else
684 //{
685 // DEBUG_LOG(("global bone %s (or variations thereof) found in model %s\n",it->str(),m_modelName.str()));
686 //}
687 }
688 }
689 for (std::vector<AsciiString>::const_iterator it = m_publicBones.begin(); it != m_publicBones.end(); ++it)
690 {
691 if (!doSingleBoneName(robj, *it, m_pristineBones))
692 {
693 // DO crash here, since we specifically requested this bone for this model
694 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: public bone '%s' (and variations thereof) not found in model %s!\n",it->str(),m_modelName.str()));
695 }
696 //else
697 //{
698 // DEBUG_LOG(("extra bone %s (or variations thereof) found in model %s\n",it->str(),m_modelName.str()));
699 //}
700 }
701
702 robj->Set_Transform(originalTransform); // restore previous transform
703 if (curAnim != NULL)
704 {
705 robj->Set_Animation(curAnim, frame, mode);
706 hlod->Set_Animation_Frame_Rate_Multiplier(mult);
707 }
708
709 if (tossRobj)
710 {
711 REF_PTR_RELEASE(robj);
712 }
713}
714
715//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
716void ModelConditionInfo::validateWeaponBarrelInfo() const
717{
718 //DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff(), ("calling validateWeaponBarrelInfo() from in GameClient!"));
719 if (m_validStuff & BARRELS_VALID)
720 return;
721
722 if (!isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff())
723 {
724 return;
725 }
726
727 setFPMode();
728
729 for (int wslot = 0; wslot < WEAPONSLOT_COUNT; ++wslot)
730 {
731 m_weaponBarrelInfoVec[wslot].clear();
732 m_hasRecoilBonesOrMuzzleFlashes[wslot] = false;
733
734 const AsciiString& fxBoneName = m_weaponFireFXBoneName[wslot];
735 const AsciiString& recoilBoneName = m_weaponRecoilBoneName[wslot];
736 const AsciiString& mfName = m_weaponMuzzleFlashName[wslot];
737 const AsciiString& plbName = m_weaponProjectileLaunchBoneName[wslot];
738
739// a useful tool for finding missing INI entries in the weapon-bone block
740// since this class has no idea which object it refers to, it must assume that the projectilelaunchbonename
741// is required if the fxBoneName is specified
742// this is not always true, since some weapons have no launched projectiles, hence the caveat in the assert message
743//#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
744// if (
745// ( m_modelName.startsWith("UV") || m_modelName.startsWith("NV") || m_modelName.startsWith("AV") ||
746// m_modelName.startsWith("uv") || m_modelName.startsWith("nv") || m_modelName.startsWith("av")
747// )
748//
749// && fxBoneName.isNotEmpty()
750//
751// )
752// DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH( plbName.isNotEmpty(), ("You appear to have a missing projectilelaunchbonename. \n Promptly ignore this assert if this model is used by a non-projectile-weapon-bearing unit\nModel name = %s.", m_modelName.str()) );
753//#endif
754
755 if (fxBoneName.isNotEmpty() || recoilBoneName.isNotEmpty() || mfName.isNotEmpty() || plbName.isNotEmpty())
756 {
757 Int prevFxBone = 0;
758 char buffer[256];
759 for (Int i = 1; i <= 99; ++i)
760 {
761 WeaponBarrelInfo info;
762 info.m_projectileOffsetMtx.Make_Identity();
763
764 if (!recoilBoneName.isEmpty())
765 {
766 sprintf(buffer, "%s%02d", recoilBoneName.str(), i);
767 findPristineBone(NAMEKEY(buffer), &info.m_recoilBone);
768 }
769 if (!mfName.isEmpty())
770 {
771 sprintf(buffer, "%s%02d", mfName.str(), i);
772 findPristineBone(NAMEKEY(buffer), &info.m_muzzleFlashBone);
773#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
774 if (info.m_muzzleFlashBone)
775 info.m_muzzleFlashBoneName = buffer;
776#endif
777 }
778 if (!fxBoneName.isEmpty())
779 {
780 sprintf(buffer, "%s%02d", fxBoneName.str(), i);
781 findPristineBone(NAMEKEY(buffer), &info.m_fxBone);
782 // special case: if we have multiple muzzleflashes, but only one fxbone, use that fxbone for everything.
783 if (info.m_fxBone == 0 && info.m_muzzleFlashBone != 0)
784 info.m_fxBone = prevFxBone;
785 }
786
787 Int plbBoneIndex = 0;
788 if (!plbName.isEmpty())
789 {
790 sprintf(buffer, "%s%02d", plbName.str(), i);
791 const Matrix3D* mtx = findPristineBone(NAMEKEY(buffer), &plbBoneIndex);
792 if (mtx != NULL)
793 info.m_projectileOffsetMtx = *mtx;
794 }
795
796 if (info.m_fxBone == 0 && info.m_recoilBone == 0 && info.m_muzzleFlashBone == 0 && plbBoneIndex == 0)
797 break;
798
799 CRCDEBUG_LOG(("validateWeaponBarrelInfo() - model name %s wslot %d\n", m_modelName.str(), wslot));
800 DUMPMATRIX3D(&(info.m_projectileOffsetMtx));
801 BONEPOS_LOG(("validateWeaponBarrelInfo() - model name %s wslot %d\n", m_modelName.str(), wslot));
802 BONEPOS_DUMPMATRIX3D(&(info.m_projectileOffsetMtx));
803 m_weaponBarrelInfoVec[wslot].push_back(info);
804
805 if (info.m_recoilBone != 0 || info.m_muzzleFlashBone != 0)
806 m_hasRecoilBonesOrMuzzleFlashes[wslot] = true;
807
808 prevFxBone = info.m_fxBone;
809 }
810
811 if (m_weaponBarrelInfoVec[wslot].empty())
812 {
813 // try the unadorned names
814 WeaponBarrelInfo info;
815 if (!recoilBoneName.isEmpty())
816 findPristineBone(NAMEKEY(recoilBoneName), &info.m_recoilBone);
817
818 if (!mfName.isEmpty())
819 findPristineBone(NAMEKEY(mfName), &info.m_muzzleFlashBone);
820
821#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
822 if (info.m_muzzleFlashBone)
823 info.m_muzzleFlashBoneName = mfName;
824#endif
825
826 const Matrix3D* plbMtx = plbName.isEmpty() ? NULL : findPristineBone(NAMEKEY(plbName), NULL);
827 if (plbMtx != NULL)
828 info.m_projectileOffsetMtx = *plbMtx;
829 else
830 info.m_projectileOffsetMtx.Make_Identity();
831
832 if (!fxBoneName.isEmpty())
833 findPristineBone(NAMEKEY(fxBoneName), &info.m_fxBone);
834
835 if (info.m_fxBone != 0 || info.m_recoilBone != 0 || info.m_muzzleFlashBone != 0 || plbMtx != NULL)
836 {
837 CRCDEBUG_LOG(("validateWeaponBarrelInfo() - model name %s (unadorned) wslot %d\n", m_modelName.str(), wslot));
838 DUMPMATRIX3D(&(info.m_projectileOffsetMtx));
839 BONEPOS_LOG(("validateWeaponBarrelInfo() - model name %s (unadorned) wslot %d\n", m_modelName.str(), wslot));
840 BONEPOS_DUMPMATRIX3D(&(info.m_projectileOffsetMtx));
841 m_weaponBarrelInfoVec[wslot].push_back(info);
842 if (info.m_recoilBone != 0 || info.m_muzzleFlashBone != 0)
843 m_hasRecoilBonesOrMuzzleFlashes[wslot] = true;
844 }
845 else
846 {
847 CRCDEBUG_LOG(("validateWeaponBarrelInfo() - model name %s (unadorned) found nothing\n", m_modelName.str()));
848 BONEPOS_LOG(("validateWeaponBarrelInfo() - model name %s (unadorned) found nothing\n", m_modelName.str()));
849 }
850 } // if empty
851
852 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(!(m_modelName.isNotEmpty() && m_weaponBarrelInfoVec[wslot].empty()), ("*** ASSET ERROR: No fx bone named '%s' found in model %s!\n",fxBoneName.str(),m_modelName.str()));
853 }
854 }
855 m_validStuff |= BARRELS_VALID;
856}
857
858//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
859void ModelConditionInfo::validateTurretInfo() const
860{
861 //DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff(), ("calling validateTurretInfo() from in GameClient!"));
862 if (m_validStuff & TURRETS_VALID)
863 return;
864
865 setFPMode();
866
867 for (int tslot = 0; tslot < MAX_TURRETS; ++tslot)
868 {
869 TurretInfo& tur = m_turrets[tslot];
870 if (!isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff() || m_modelName.isEmpty())
871 {
872 tur.m_turretAngleBone = 0;
873 tur.m_turretPitchBone = 0;
874 continue;
875 }
876
877 if (tur.m_turretAngleNameKey != NAMEKEY_INVALID)
878 {
879 if (findPristineBone(tur.m_turretAngleNameKey, &tur.m_turretAngleBone) == NULL)
880 {
881 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: TurretBone %s not found! (%s)\n",KEYNAME(tur.m_turretAngleNameKey).str(),m_modelName.str()));
882 tur.m_turretAngleBone = 0;
883 }
884 }
885 else
886 {
887 tur.m_turretAngleBone = 0;
888 }
889
890 if (tur.m_turretPitchNameKey != NAMEKEY_INVALID)
891 {
892 if (findPristineBone(tur.m_turretPitchNameKey, &tur.m_turretPitchBone) == NULL)
893 {
894 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: TurretBone %s not found! (%s)\n",KEYNAME(tur.m_turretPitchNameKey).str(),m_modelName.str()));
895 tur.m_turretPitchBone = 0;
896 }
897 }
898 else
899 {
900 tur.m_turretPitchBone = 0;
901 }
902 }
903
904 if (isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff())
905 {
906 m_validStuff |= TURRETS_VALID;
907 }
908}
909
910//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
911const Matrix3D* ModelConditionInfo::findPristineBone(NameKeyType boneName, Int* boneIndex) const
912{
913 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH((m_validStuff & PRISTINE_BONES_VALID), ("*** ASSET ERROR: bones are not valid"));
914 if (!(m_validStuff & PRISTINE_BONES_VALID))
915 {
916 // set it to zero, some callers rely on this
917 if (boneIndex)
918 *boneIndex = 0;
919 return NULL;
920 }
921
922 if (boneName == NAMEKEY_INVALID)
923 {
924 // set it to zero, some callers rely on this
925 if (boneIndex)
926 *boneIndex = 0;
927 return NULL;
928 }
929
930 PristineBoneInfoMap::const_iterator it = m_pristineBones.find(boneName);
931 if (it != m_pristineBones.end())
932 {
933 if (boneIndex)
934 *boneIndex = it->second.boneIndex;
935 return &it->second.mtx;
936 }
937 else
938 {
939 // set it to zero -- some callers rely on this!
940 if (boneIndex)
941 *boneIndex = 0;
942 return NULL;
943 }
944}
945
946//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
947Bool ModelConditionInfo::findPristineBonePos(NameKeyType boneName, Coord3D& pos) const
948{
949 const Matrix3D* mtx = findPristineBone(boneName, NULL);
950 if (mtx)
951 {
952 Vector3 v = mtx->Get_Translation();
953 pos.x = v.X;
954 pos.y = v.Y;
955 pos.z = v.Z;
956 return true;
957 }
958 else
959 {
960 pos.zero();
961 return false;
962 }
963}

965//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
966void ModelConditionInfo::loadAnimations() const
967{
968#ifdef RETAIN_ANIM_HANDLES
969 for (W3DAnimationVector::const_iterator it2 = m_animations.begin(); it2 != m_animations.end(); ++it2)
970 {
971 HAnimClass* h = it2->getAnimHandle(); // just force it to get loaded
972 REF_PTR_RELEASE(h);
973 h = NULL;
974 }
975#else
976 // srj sez: I think there is no real reason to preload these all anymore. things that need the anims
977 // (for bones) will force an implicit load anyway, but there's no point in forcibly loading the anims
978 // that don't contain interesting logical bones.
979#endif
980}

983void ModelConditionInfo::clear()

985 int i;
986#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
987 m_description.clear();
988#endif
989 m_conditionsYesVec.clear();
990 m_modelName.clear();
991 for (i = 0; i < MAX_TURRETS; ++i)
992 {
993 m_turrets[i].clear();
994 }
995 m_hideShowVec.clear();
996 for (i = 0; i < WEAPONSLOT_COUNT; ++i)
997 {
998 m_weaponFireFXBoneName[i].clear();
999 m_weaponRecoilBoneName[i].clear();
1000 m_weaponMuzzleFlashName[i].clear();
1001 m_weaponProjectileLaunchBoneName[i].clear();
1002 m_weaponBarrelInfoVec[i].clear();
1003 m_hasRecoilBonesOrMuzzleFlashes[i] = false;
1004 }
1005 m_particleSysBones.clear();
1006 m_animations.clear();
1007 m_flags = 0;
1008 m_transitionKey = NAMEKEY_INVALID;
1009 m_allowToFinishKey = NAMEKEY_INVALID;
1010 m_iniReadFlags = 0;
1011 m_mode = RenderObjClass::ANIM_MODE_ONCE;
1012 m_transitionSig = NO_TRANSITION;
1013 m_animMinSpeedFactor = 1.0f;
1014 m_animMaxSpeedFactor = 1.0f;
1015 m_pristineBones.clear();
1016 m_validStuff = 0;
1017}

1020W3DModelDrawModuleData::W3DModelDrawModuleData() :

1048//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1049void W3DModelDrawModuleData::validateStuffForTimeAndWeather(const Drawable* draw, Bool night, Bool snowy) const
1050{
1051 if (!isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff())
1052 return;
1053
1054 enum
1055 {
1056 NORMAL = 0x0001,
1057 NIGHT = 0x0002,
1058 SNOWY = 0x0004,
1059 NIGHT_SNOWY = 0x0008
1060 };
1061
1062 Int mode;
1063 if (night)
1064 {
1065 mode = (snowy) ? NIGHT_SNOWY : NIGHT;
1066 }
1067 else
1068 {
1069 mode = (snowy) ? SNOWY : NORMAL;
1070 }
1071
1072 if (m_validated & mode)
1073 return;
1074
1075 m_validated |= mode;
1076
1077 for (ModelConditionVector::iterator c_it = m_conditionStates.begin(); c_it != m_conditionStates.end(); ++c_it)
1078 {
1079 if (!c_it->matchesMode(false, false) && !c_it->matchesMode(night, snowy))
1080 continue;
1081
1082 c_it->validateStuff(NULL, draw->getScale(), m_extraPublicBones);
1083 }
1084
1085 for (TransitionMap::iterator t_it = m_transitionMap.begin(); t_it != m_transitionMap.end(); ++t_it)
1086 {
1087 // here's the tricky part: only want to load the anims for this one if there is at least one
1088 // source AND at least one dest state that matches the current mode
1089 NameKeyType src = recoverSrcState(t_it->first);
1090 NameKeyType dst = recoverDstState(t_it->first);
1091
1092 Bool a = false;
1093 Bool b = false;
1094 for (c_it = m_conditionStates.begin(); c_it != m_conditionStates.end(); ++c_it)
1095 {
1096
1097 if (!a && c_it->m_transitionKey == src && c_it->matchesMode(night, snowy))
1098 a = true;
1099
1100 if (!b && c_it->m_transitionKey == dst && c_it->matchesMode(night, snowy))
1101 b = true;
1102
1103 }
1104 if (a && b)
1105 {
1106 t_it->second.loadAnimations();
1107 // nope -- transition states don't get public bones.
1108 //it->addPublicBone(m_extraPublicBones);
1109
1110 // srj sez: hm, this doesn't make sense; I think we really do need to validate transition states.
1111 t_it->second.validateStuff(NULL, draw->getScale(), m_extraPublicBones);
1112 }
1113 }
1114}

1146#ifdef CACHE_ATTACH_BONE
1147//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1148const Vector3* W3DModelDrawModuleData::getAttachToDrawableBoneOffset(const Drawable* draw) const
1149{
1150 if (m_attachToDrawableBone.isEmpty())
1151 {
1152 return NULL;
1153 }
1154 else
1155 {
1156 if (!m_attachToDrawableBoneOffsetValid)
1157 {
1158 // must use pristine bone here since the result is used by logic
1159 Matrix3D boneMtx;
1160 if (draw->getPristineBonePositions(m_attachToDrawableBone.str(), 0, NULL, &boneMtx, 1) == 1)
1161 {
1162 m_attachToDrawableBoneOffset = boneMtx.Get_Translation();
1163 }
1164 else
1165 {
1166 m_attachToDrawableBoneOffset.X = 0;
1167 m_attachToDrawableBoneOffset.Y = 0;
1168 m_attachToDrawableBoneOffset.Z = 0;
1169 }
1170 m_attachToDrawableBoneOffsetValid = true;
1171 }
1172 return &m_attachToDrawableBoneOffset;
1173 }
1174}
1175#endif

1225//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1226enum AnimParseType
1227{
1228 ANIM_NORMAL,
1229 ANIM_IDLE
1230};
1231
1232//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1233static void parseAnimation(INI* ini, void *instance, void * /*store*/, const void* userData)
1234{
1235 AnimParseType animType = (AnimParseType)(UnsignedInt)userData;
1236
1237 AsciiString animName = ini->getNextAsciiString();
1238 animName.toLower();
1239
1240 const char* distanceCoveredToken = ini->getNextTokenOrNull();
1241 Real distanceCovered = distanceCoveredToken ? INI::scanReal(distanceCoveredToken) : 0;
1242 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(!(animType == ANIM_IDLE && distanceCovered != 0), ("You should not specify nonzero DistanceCovered values for Idle Anims"));
1243
1244 const char* timesToRepeatToken = ini->getNextTokenOrNull();
1245 Int timesToRepeat = timesToRepeatToken ? INI::scanInt(timesToRepeatToken) : 1;
1246 if (timesToRepeat < 1) timesToRepeat = 1;
1247
1248 W3DAnimationInfo animInfo(animName, (animType == ANIM_IDLE), distanceCovered);
1249
1250 ModelConditionInfo* self = (ModelConditionInfo*)instance;
1251 if (self->m_iniReadFlags & (1<<ANIMS_COPIED_FROM_DEFAULT_STATE))
1252 {
1253 self->m_iniReadFlags &= ~((1<<ANIMS_COPIED_FROM_DEFAULT_STATE)|(1<<GOT_IDLE_ANIMS)|(1<<GOT_NONIDLE_ANIMS));
1254 self->m_animations.clear();
1255 }
1256
1257 if (animInfo.isIdleAnim())
1258 self->m_iniReadFlags |= (1<<GOT_IDLE_ANIMS);
1259 else
1260 self->m_iniReadFlags |= (1<<GOT_NONIDLE_ANIMS);
1261
1262 if (!animName.isEmpty() && !animName.isNone())
1263 {
1264 while (timesToRepeat--)
1265 self->m_animations.push_back(animInfo);
1266 }
1267}
1268
1269//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1270static void parseShowHideSubObject(INI* ini, void *instance, void *store, const void* userData)
1271{
1272 std::vector<ModelConditionInfo::HideShowSubObjInfo>* vec = (std::vector<ModelConditionInfo::HideShowSubObjInfo>*)store;
1273 AsciiString subObjName = ini->getNextAsciiString();
1274 subObjName.toLower();
1275
1276 // handle "None"
1277 if (subObjName.isNone())
1278 {
1279 vec->clear();
1280 return;
1281 }
1282
1283 while (subObjName.isNotEmpty())
1284 {
1285 Bool found = false;
1286 for (std::vector<ModelConditionInfo::HideShowSubObjInfo>::iterator it = vec->begin(); it != vec->end(); ++it)
1287 {
1288 if (stricmp(it->subObjName.str(), subObjName.str()) == 0)
1289 {
1290 it->hide = (userData != NULL);
1291 found = true;
1292 }
1293 }
1294
1295 if (!found)
1296 {
1297 ModelConditionInfo::HideShowSubObjInfo info;
1298 info.subObjName = subObjName;
1299 info.hide = (userData != NULL);
1300 vec->push_back(info);
1301 }
1302 subObjName = ini->getNextAsciiString();
1303 subObjName.toLower();
1304 }
1305}
1306
1307//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1308void W3DModelDraw::showSubObject( const AsciiString& name, Bool show )
1309{
1310 if( name.isNotEmpty() )
1311 {
1312 Bool found = false;
1313 for( std::vector<ModelConditionInfo::HideShowSubObjInfo>::iterator it = m_subObjectVec.begin(); it != m_subObjectVec.end(); ++it )
1314 {
1315 if( stricmp( it->subObjName.str(), name.str() ) == 0 )
1316 {
1317 it->hide = !show;
1318 found = true;
1319 }
1320 }
1321
1322 if( !found )
1323 {
1324 ModelConditionInfo::HideShowSubObjInfo info;
1325 info.subObjName = name;
1326 info.hide = !show;
1327 m_subObjectVec.push_back( info );
1328 }
1329 }
1330}
1331
1332
1333
1334//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1335static void parseWeaponBoneName(INI* ini, void *instance, void * store, const void* /*userData*/)
1336{
1337 ModelConditionInfo* self = (ModelConditionInfo*)instance;
1338 AsciiString* arr = (AsciiString*)store;
1339
1340 WeaponSlotType wslot = (WeaponSlotType)INI::scanIndexList(ini->getNextToken(), TheWeaponSlotTypeNames);
1341 arr[wslot] = ini->getNextAsciiString();
1342 arr[wslot].toLower();
1343 if (arr[wslot].isNone())
1344 arr[wslot].clear();
1345
1346 if (self)
1347 self->addPublicBone(arr[wslot]);
1348}
1349
1350//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1351static void parseParticleSysBone(INI* ini, void *instance, void * store, const void * /*userData*/)
1352{
1353 ParticleSysBoneInfo info;
1354 info.boneName = ini->getNextAsciiString();
1355 info.boneName.toLower();
1356 ini->parseParticleSystemTemplate(ini, instance, &(info.particleSystemTemplate), NULL);
1357 ModelConditionInfo *self = (ModelConditionInfo *)instance;
1358 self->m_particleSysBones.push_back(info);
1359}
1360
1361//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1362static void parseRealRange( INI *ini, void *instance, void *store, const void* /*userData*/ )
1363{
1364 ModelConditionInfo *self = (ModelConditionInfo *)instance;
1365
1366 const char *token = ini->getNextToken();
1367 self->m_animMinSpeedFactor = ini->scanReal( token );
1368 token = ini->getNextToken();
1369 self->m_animMaxSpeedFactor = ini->scanReal( token );
1370}
1371
1372//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1373static void parseLowercaseNameKey(INI* ini, void *instance, void * store, const void * /*userData*/)
1374{
1375 NameKeyType* key = (NameKeyType*)store;
1376
1377 AsciiString tmp = ini->getNextToken();
1378 tmp.toLower();
1379
1380 *key = NAMEKEY(tmp.str());
1381}
1382
1383//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1384static void parseBoneNameKey(INI* ini, void *instance, void * store, const void * /*userData*/)
1385{
1386 ModelConditionInfo* self = (ModelConditionInfo*)instance;
1387 NameKeyType* key = (NameKeyType*)store;
1388
1389 AsciiString tmp = ini->getNextToken();
1390 tmp.toLower();
1391
1392 if (self)
1393 self->addPublicBone(tmp);
1394
1395 if (tmp.isEmpty() || tmp.isNone())
1396 *key = NAMEKEY_INVALID;
1397 else
1398 *key = NAMEKEY(tmp.str());
1399}
1400
1401//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1402static Bool doesStateExist(const ModelConditionVector& v, const ModelConditionFlags& f)
1403{
1404 for (ModelConditionVector::const_iterator it = v.begin(); it != v.end(); ++it)
1405 {
1406 for (Int i = it->getConditionsYesCount()-1; i >= 0; --i)
1407 {
1408 if (f == it->getNthConditionsYes(i))
1409 return true;
1410 }
1411 }
1412 return false;
1413}
1414
1415//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1416void W3DModelDrawModuleData::parseConditionState(INI* ini, void *instance, void * /*store*/, const void* userData)
1417{
1418 static const FieldParse myFieldParse[] =
1419 {
1420 { "Model", parseAsciiStringLC, NULL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_modelName) },
1421 { "Turret", parseBoneNameKey, NULL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_turrets[0].m_turretAngleNameKey) },
1422 { "TurretArtAngle", INI::parseAngleReal, NULL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_turrets[0].m_turretArtAngle) },
1423 { "TurretPitch", parseBoneNameKey, NULL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_turrets[0].m_turretPitchNameKey) },
1424 { "TurretArtPitch", INI::parseAngleReal, NULL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_turrets[0].m_turretArtPitch) },
1425 { "AltTurret", parseBoneNameKey, NULL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_turrets[1].m_turretAngleNameKey) },
1426 { "AltTurretArtAngle", INI::parseAngleReal, NULL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_turrets[1].m_turretArtAngle) },
1427 { "AltTurretPitch", parseBoneNameKey, NULL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_turrets[1].m_turretPitchNameKey) },
1428 { "AltTurretArtPitch", INI::parseAngleReal, NULL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_turrets[1].m_turretArtPitch) },
1429 { "ShowSubObject", parseShowHideSubObject, (void*)0, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_hideShowVec) },
1430 { "HideSubObject", parseShowHideSubObject, (void*)1, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_hideShowVec) },
1431 { "WeaponFireFXBone", parseWeaponBoneName, NULL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_weaponFireFXBoneName[0]) },
1432 { "WeaponRecoilBone", parseWeaponBoneName, NULL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_weaponRecoilBoneName[0]) },
1433 { "WeaponMuzzleFlash", parseWeaponBoneName, NULL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_weaponMuzzleFlashName[0]) },
1434 { "WeaponLaunchBone", parseWeaponBoneName, NULL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_weaponProjectileLaunchBoneName[0]) },
1435 { "WeaponHideShowBone", parseWeaponBoneName, NULL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_weaponProjectileHideShowName[0]) },
1436 { "Animation", parseAnimation, (void*)ANIM_NORMAL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_animations) },
1437 { "IdleAnimation", parseAnimation, (void*)ANIM_IDLE, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_animations) },
1438 { "AnimationMode", INI::parseIndexList, TheAnimModeNames, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_mode) },
1439 { "TransitionKey", parseLowercaseNameKey, NULL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_transitionKey) },
1440 { "WaitForStateToFinishIfPossible", parseLowercaseNameKey, NULL, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_allowToFinishKey) },
1441 { "Flags", INI::parseBitString32, ACBitsNames, offsetof(ModelConditionInfo, m_flags) },
1442 { "ParticleSysBone", parseParticleSysBone, NULL, 0 },
1443 { "AnimationSpeedFactorRange", parseRealRange, NULL, 0 },
1444 { 0, 0, 0, 0 }
1445 };
1446
1447 ModelConditionInfo info;
1448 W3DModelDrawModuleData* self = (W3DModelDrawModuleData*)instance;
1449 ParseCondStateType cst = (ParseCondStateType)(UnsignedInt)userData;
1450 switch (cst)
1451 {
1452 case PARSE_DEFAULT:
1453 {
1454 if (self->m_defaultState >= 0)
1455 {
1456 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: you may have only one default state!\n"));
1457 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1458 }
1459 else if (ini->getNextTokenOrNull())
1460 {
1461 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: unknown keyword\n"));
1462 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1463 }
1464 else
1465 {
1466 if (!self->m_conditionStates.empty())
1467 {
1468 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: when using DefaultConditionState, it must be the first state listed (%s)\n",TheThingTemplateBeingParsedName.str()));
1469 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1470 }
1471
1472 // note, this is size(), not size()-1, since we haven't actually modified the list yet
1473 self->m_defaultState = self->m_conditionStates.size();
1474 //DEBUG_LOG(("set default state to %d\n",self->m_defaultState));
1475
1476 // add an empty conditionstateflag set
1477 ModelConditionFlags blankConditions;
1478 info.m_conditionsYesVec.clear();
1479 info.m_conditionsYesVec.push_back(blankConditions);
1480
1481 #if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
1482 info.m_description.clear();
1483 info.m_description.concat(TheThingTemplateBeingParsedName);
1484 info.m_description.concat(" DEFAULT");
1485 #endif
1486 }
1487 }
1488 break;
1489
1490 case PARSE_TRANSITION:
1491 {
1492 AsciiString firstNm = ini->getNextToken(); firstNm.toLower();
1493 AsciiString secondNm = ini->getNextToken(); secondNm.toLower();
1494 NameKeyType firstKey = NAMEKEY(firstNm);
1495 NameKeyType secondKey = NAMEKEY(secondNm);
1496
1497 if (firstKey == secondKey)
1498 {
1499 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: You may not declare a transition between two identical states\n"));
1500 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1501 }
1502
1503 if (self->m_defaultState >= 0)
1504 {
1505 info = self->m_conditionStates.at(self->m_defaultState);
1506 info.m_iniReadFlags |= (1<<ANIMS_COPIED_FROM_DEFAULT_STATE);
1507 info.m_transitionKey = NAMEKEY_INVALID;
1508 info.m_allowToFinishKey = NAMEKEY_INVALID;
1509 }
1510
1511 info.m_transitionSig = buildTransitionSig(firstKey, secondKey);
1512 #if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
1513 info.m_description.clear();
1514 info.m_description.concat(TheThingTemplateBeingParsedName);
1515 info.m_description.concat(" TRANSITION: ");
1516 info.m_description.concat(firstNm);
1517 info.m_description.concat(" ");
1518 info.m_description.concat(secondNm);
1519 #endif
1520
1521 }
1522 break;
1523
1524 case PARSE_ALIAS:
1525 {
1526 if (self->m_conditionStates.empty())
1527 {
1528 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: AliasConditionState must refer to the previous state!\n"));
1529 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1530 }
1531
1532 ModelConditionInfo& prevState = self->m_conditionStates.at(self->m_conditionStates.size()-1);
1533
1534 ModelConditionFlags conditionsYes;
1535
1536 #if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
1537 AsciiString description;
1538 conditionsYes.parse(ini, &description);
1539
1540 prevState.m_description.concat("\nAKA: ");
1541 prevState.m_description.concat(description);
1542 #else
1543 conditionsYes.parse(ini, NULL);
1544 #endif
1545
1546 if (conditionsYes.anyIntersectionWith(self->m_ignoreConditionStates))
1547 {
1548 DEBUG_CRASH(("You should not specify bits in a state once they are used in IgnoreConditionStates (%s)\n", TheThingTemplateBeingParsedName.str()));
1549 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1550 }
1551
1552 if (doesStateExist(self->m_conditionStates, conditionsYes))
1553 {
1554 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: duplicate condition states are not currently allowed"));
1555 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1556 }
1557
1558
1559 if (!conditionsYes.any() && self->m_defaultState >= 0)
1560 {
1561 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: you may not specify both a Default state and a Conditions=None state"));
1562 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1563 }
1564
1565 prevState.m_conditionsYesVec.push_back(conditionsYes);
1566
1567 // yes, return, NOT break!
1568 return;
1569 }
1570
1571 case PARSE_NORMAL:
1572 {
1573 if (self->m_defaultState >= 0 && cst != PARSE_ALIAS)
1574 {
1575 info = self->m_conditionStates.at(self->m_defaultState);
1576 info.m_iniReadFlags |= (1<<ANIMS_COPIED_FROM_DEFAULT_STATE);
1577 info.m_conditionsYesVec.clear();
1578 }
1579 // no, we do not currently require a default state, cuz it would break the exiting INI
1580 // files too badly. maybe someday.
1581 // else
1582 // {
1583 // DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: you must specify a default state\n"));
1584 // throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1585 // }
1586
1587 ModelConditionFlags conditionsYes;
1588 #if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
1589 AsciiString description;
1590 conditionsYes.parse(ini, &description);
1591
1592 info.m_description.clear();
1593 info.m_description.concat(TheThingTemplateBeingParsedName);
1594 info.m_description.concat("\n ");
1595 info.m_description.concat(description);
1596 #else
1597 conditionsYes.parse(ini, NULL);
1598 #endif
1599
1600 if (conditionsYes.anyIntersectionWith(self->m_ignoreConditionStates))
1601 {
1602 DEBUG_CRASH(("You should not specify bits in a state once they are used in IgnoreConditionStates (%s)\n", TheThingTemplateBeingParsedName.str()));
1603 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1604 }
1605
1606 if (self->m_defaultState < 0 && self->m_conditionStates.empty() && conditionsYes.any())
1607 {
1608 // it doesn't actually NEED to be first, but it does need to be present, and this is the simplest way to enforce...
1609 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: when not using DefaultConditionState, the first ConditionState must be for NONE (%s)\n",TheThingTemplateBeingParsedName.str()));
1610 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1611 }
1612
1613 if (!conditionsYes.any() && self->m_defaultState >= 0)
1614 {
1615 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: you may not specify both a Default state and a Conditions=None state"));
1616 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1617 }
1618
1619 if (doesStateExist(self->m_conditionStates, conditionsYes))
1620 {
1621 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: duplicate condition states are not currently allowed (%s)",info.m_description.str()));
1622 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1623 }
1624
1625 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(info.m_conditionsYesVec.size() == 0, ("*** ASSET ERROR: nonempty m_conditionsYesVec.size(), see srj"));
1626 info.m_conditionsYesVec.clear();
1627 info.m_conditionsYesVec.push_back(conditionsYes);
1628 }
1629 break;
1630 }
1631
1632 ini->initFromINI(&info, myFieldParse);
1633
1634 if (info.m_modelName.isEmpty())
1635 {
1636 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: you must specify a model name"));
1637 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1638 }
1639 else if (info.m_modelName.isNone())
1640 {
1641 info.m_modelName.clear();
1642 }
1643
1644 if ((info.m_iniReadFlags & (1<<GOT_IDLE_ANIMS)) && (info.m_iniReadFlags & (1<<GOT_NONIDLE_ANIMS)))
1645 {
1646 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: you should not specify both Animations and IdleAnimations for the same state"));
1647 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1648 }
1649
1650 if ((info.m_iniReadFlags & (1<<GOT_IDLE_ANIMS)) && (info.m_mode != RenderObjClass::ANIM_MODE_ONCE && info.m_mode != RenderObjClass::ANIM_MODE_ONCE_BACKWARDS))
1651 {
1652 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: Idle Anims should always use ONCE or ONCE_BACKWARDS (%s)\n",TheThingTemplateBeingParsedName.str()));
1653 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1654 }
1655
1656 info.m_validStuff &= ~ModelConditionInfo::HAS_PROJECTILE_BONES;
1657 for (int wslot = 0; wslot < WEAPONSLOT_COUNT; ++wslot)
1658 {
1659 if (info.m_weaponProjectileLaunchBoneName[wslot].isNotEmpty())
1660 {
1661 info.m_validStuff |= ModelConditionInfo::HAS_PROJECTILE_BONES;
1662 break;
1663 }
1664 }
1665
1666 if (cst == PARSE_TRANSITION)
1667 {
1668 if (info.m_iniReadFlags & (1<<GOT_IDLE_ANIMS))
1669 {
1670 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: Transition States should not specify Idle anims"));
1671 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1672 }
1673
1674 if (info.m_mode != RenderObjClass::ANIM_MODE_ONCE && info.m_mode != RenderObjClass::ANIM_MODE_ONCE_BACKWARDS)
1675 {
1676 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: Transition States should always use ONCE or ONCE_BACKWARDS"));
1677 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1678 }
1679
1680 if (info.m_transitionKey != NAMEKEY_INVALID || info.m_allowToFinishKey != NAMEKEY_INVALID)
1681 {
1682 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: Transition States must not have transition keys or m_allowToFinishKey"));
1683 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1684 }
1685
1686 self->m_transitionMap[info.m_transitionSig] = info;
1687 }
1688 else
1689 {
1690 self->m_conditionStates.push_back(info);
1691 }
1692}
1693
1694//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1695static Int countOnBits(UnsignedInt val)
1696{
1697 Int count = 0;
1698 for (Int i = 0; i < 32; ++i)
1699 {
1700 if (val & 1)
1701 ++count;
1702 val >>= 1;
1703 }
1704 return count;
1705}
1706
1707//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1708const ModelConditionInfo* W3DModelDrawModuleData::findBestInfo(const ModelConditionFlags& c) const
1709{
1710 ModelConditionFlags bits = c;
1711 bits.clear(m_ignoreConditionStates);
1712 return m_conditionStateMap.findBestInfo(m_conditionStates, bits);
1713}

1717
1718//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1719//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1720W3DModelDraw::W3DModelDraw(Thing *thing, const ModuleData* moduleData) : DrawModule(thing, moduleData)
1721{
1722 int i;
1723 m_animationMode = RenderObjClass::ANIM_MODE_LOOP;
1724 m_hideHeadlights = true;
1725 m_pauseAnimation = false;
1726 m_curState = NULL;
1727 m_hexColor = 0;
1728 m_renderObject = NULL;
1729 m_shadow = NULL;
1730 m_shadowEnabled = TRUE;
1731 m_terrainDecal = NULL;
1732 m_trackRenderObject = NULL;
1733 m_whichAnimInCurState = -1;
1734 m_nextState = NULL;
1735 m_nextStateAnimLoopDuration = NO_NEXT_DURATION;
1736 for (i = 0; i < WEAPONSLOT_COUNT; ++i)
1737 {
1738 m_weaponRecoilInfoVec[i].clear();
1739 }
1740 m_needRecalcBoneParticleSystems = false;
1741 m_fullyObscuredByShroud = false;
1742
1743 // only validate the current time-of-day and weather conditions by default.
1744 getW3DModelDrawModuleData()->validateStuffForTimeAndWeather(getDrawable(),
1745 TheGlobalData->m_timeOfDay == TIME_OF_DAY_NIGHT,
1746 TheGlobalData->m_weather == WEATHER_SNOWY);
1747
1748 ModelConditionFlags emptyFlags;
1749 const ModelConditionInfo* info = findBestInfo(emptyFlags);
1750 if (!info)
1751 {
1752 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: all draw modules must have an IDLE state\n"));
1753 throw INI_INVALID_DATA;
1754 }
1755
1756 Drawable* draw = getDrawable();
1757
1758 if ( draw )
1759 {
1760 Object* obj = draw->getObject();
1761 if (obj)
1762 {
1763 if (TheGlobalData->m_timeOfDay == TIME_OF_DAY_NIGHT)
1764 m_hexColor = obj->getNightIndicatorColor();
1765 else
1766 m_hexColor = obj->getIndicatorColor();
1767 }
1768
1769 // THE VAST MAJORITY OF THESE SHOULD BE TRUE
1770 if ( ! getW3DModelDrawModuleData()->m_receivesDynamicLights)
1771 {
1772 draw->setReceivesDynamicLights( FALSE );
1773 DEBUG_LOG(("setReceivesDynamicLights = FALSE: %s\n", draw->getTemplate()->getName().str()));
1774 }
1775 }
1776
1777 setModelState(info);
1778}
1779

1782void W3DModelDraw::onDrawableBoundToObject(void)
1783{
1784 getW3DModelDrawModuleData()->validateStuffForTimeAndWeather(getDrawable(),
1785 TheGlobalData->m_timeOfDay == TIME_OF_DAY_NIGHT,
1786 TheGlobalData->m_weather == WEATHER_SNOWY);
1787}

1791W3DModelDraw::~W3DModelDraw(void)

1793 if (m_trackRenderObject && TheTerrainTracksRenderObjClassSystem)
1794 {
1795 TheTerrainTracksRenderObjClassSystem->unbindTrack(m_trackRenderObject);
1796 m_trackRenderObject = NULL;
1797 }
1798
1799 nukeCurrentRender(NULL);
1800}

1802//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1803void W3DModelDraw::doStartOrStopParticleSys()
1804{
1805 Bool hidden = getDrawable()->isDrawableEffectivelyHidden() || m_fullyObscuredByShroud;
1806
1807 for (std::vector<ParticleSysTrackerType>::const_iterator it = m_particleSystemIDs.begin(); it != m_particleSystemIDs.end(); ++it)
1808 //for (std::vector<ParticleSystemID>::const_iterator it = m_particleSystemIDs.begin(); it != m_particleSystemIDs.end(); ++it)
1809 {
1810 ParticleSystem *sys = TheParticleSystemManager->findParticleSystem((*it).id);
1811 if (sys != NULL) {
1812 // this can be NULL
1813 if (hidden) {
1814 sys->stop();
1815 } else {
1816 sys->start();
1817 }
1818 }
1819 }
1820}
1821
1822//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1823void W3DModelDraw::setHidden(Bool hidden)
1824{
1825 if (m_renderObject)
1826 m_renderObject->Set_Hidden(hidden);
1827
1828 if (m_shadow)
1829 m_shadow->enableShadowRender(!hidden);
1830
1831 m_shadowEnabled = hidden;
1832
1833 if (m_terrainDecal)
1834 m_terrainDecal->enableShadowRender(!hidden);
1835
1836 if (m_trackRenderObject && hidden)
1837 { const Coord3D* pos = getDrawable()->getPosition();
1838 m_trackRenderObject->addCapEdgeToTrack(pos->x,pos->y);
1839 }
1840
1841 doStartOrStopParticleSys();
1842}
1843
1845void W3DModelDraw::releaseShadows(void)
1846{
1847 if (m_shadow)
1848 m_shadow->release();
1849 m_shadow = NULL;
1850}
1851
1853void W3DModelDraw::allocateShadows(void)
1854{
1855 const ThingTemplate *tmplate=getDrawable()->getTemplate();
1856
1857 //Check if we don't already have a shadow but need one for this type of model.
1858 if (m_shadow == NULL && m_renderObject && TheW3DShadowManager && tmplate->getShadowType() != SHADOW_NONE)
1859 {
1860 Shadow::ShadowTypeInfo shadowInfo;
1861 strcpy(shadowInfo.m_ShadowName, tmplate->getShadowTextureName().str());
1862 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(shadowInfo.m_ShadowName[0] != '\0', ("this should be validated in ThingTemplate now"));
1863 shadowInfo.allowUpdates = FALSE; //shadow image will never update
1864 shadowInfo.allowWorldAlign = TRUE; //shadow image will wrap around world objects
1865 shadowInfo.m_type = (ShadowType)tmplate->getShadowType();
1866 shadowInfo.m_sizeX = tmplate->getShadowSizeX();
1867 shadowInfo.m_sizeY = tmplate->getShadowSizeY();
1868 shadowInfo.m_offsetX = tmplate->getShadowOffsetX();
1869 shadowInfo.m_offsetY = tmplate->getShadowOffsetY();
1870 m_shadow = TheW3DShadowManager->addShadow(m_renderObject, &shadowInfo);
1871 if (m_shadow)
1872 { m_shadow->enableShadowInvisible(m_fullyObscuredByShroud);
1873 if (m_renderObject->Is_Hidden() || !m_shadowEnabled)
1874 m_shadow->enableShadowRender(FALSE);
1875 }
1876 }
1877}
1878
1879//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1880void W3DModelDraw::setShadowsEnabled(Bool enable)
1881{
1882 if (m_shadow)
1883 m_shadow->enableShadowRender(enable);
1884 m_shadowEnabled = enable;
1885}

1888#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
1889void W3DModelDraw::getRenderCost(RenderCost & rc) const
1890{
1891 getRenderCostRecursive(rc,m_renderObject);
1892 if (m_shadow)
1893 m_shadow->getRenderCost(rc);
1894}
1895#endif //_DEBUG || _INTERNAL
1896
1897
1899#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
1900void W3DModelDraw::getRenderCostRecursive(RenderCost & rc,RenderObjClass * robj) const
1901{
1902 if (robj == NULL) return;
1903
1904 // recurse through sub-objects
1905 for (int i=0; i<robj->Get_Num_Sub_Objects(); i++) {
1906 RenderObjClass * sub_obj = robj->Get_Sub_Object(i);
1907 getRenderCostRecursive(rc,sub_obj);
1908 REF_PTR_RELEASE(sub_obj);
1909 }
1910
1911 // Only consider visible sub-objects. Some vehicles have hidden headlight cones for example
1912 // that are not normally rendered.
1913 if (robj->Is_Not_Hidden_At_All()) {
1914
1915 // collect stats from meshes
1916 if (robj->Class_ID() == RenderObjClass::CLASSID_MESH) {
1917 MeshClass * mesh = (MeshClass*)robj;
1918 MeshModelClass * model = mesh->Peek_Model();
1919 if (model != NULL)
1920 { if (model->Get_Flag(MeshGeometryClass::SORT))
1921 rc.addSortedMeshes(1);
1922 if (model->Get_Flag(MeshGeometryClass::SKIN))
1923 rc.addSkinMeshes(1);
1924 }
1925
1926 rc.addDrawCalls(mesh->Get_Draw_Call_Count());
1927 }
1928
1929 // collect bone stats.
1930 const HTreeClass * htree = robj->Get_HTree();
1931 if (htree != NULL) {
1932 rc.addBones(htree->Num_Pivots());
1933 }
1934 }
1935}
1936#endif //_DEBUG || _INTERNAL

1966//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1967void W3DModelDraw::adjustAnimSpeedToMovementSpeed()
1968{
1969 // if the cur animation has a "distance covered" number, try to throttle
1970 // the animation rate to match our actual speed.
1971 Real dist = getCurAnimDistanceCovered();
1972 if (dist > 0.0f)
1973 {
1974 const Object *obj = getDrawable()->getObject();
1975 if (obj)
1976 {
1977 const PhysicsBehavior* physics = obj->getPhysics();
1978 if (physics)
1979 {
1980 Real speed = physics->getVelocityMagnitude(); // in dist/frame
1981 if (speed > 0.0f)
1982 {
1983 // if distance-covered is specified for this anim, adjust the frame rate
1984 // so it appears to sync with our unit speed
1985 Real desiredDurationInMsec = dist / speed * MSEC_PER_LOGICFRAME_REAL;
1986 setCurAnimDurationInMsec(desiredDurationInMsec);
1987 }
1988 }
1989 }
1990 }
1991}
1992
1993//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1994void W3DModelDraw::adjustTransformMtx(Matrix3D& mtx) const
1995{
1996 const W3DModelDrawModuleData* d = getW3DModelDrawModuleData();
1997
1998#ifdef CACHE_ATTACH_BONE
1999 const Vector3* offset = d->getAttachToDrawableBoneOffset(getDrawable());
2000 if (offset)
2001 {
2002 Vector3 tmp = mtx.Rotate_Vector(*offset);
2003 mtx.Adjust_X_Translation(tmp.X);
2004 mtx.Adjust_Y_Translation(tmp.Y);
2005 mtx.Adjust_Z_Translation(tmp.Z);
2006 }
2007#else
2008 if (d->m_attachToDrawableBone.isNotEmpty())
2009 {
2010 // override the mtx in this case. yes, call drawable, since the bone in question is
2011 // likely to be in another module!
2012 Matrix3D boneMtx;
2013 if (getDrawable()->getCurrentWorldspaceClientBonePositions(d->m_attachToDrawableBone.str(), boneMtx))
2014 {
2015 mtx = boneMtx;
2016 }
2017 else
2018 {
2019 DEBUG_LOG(("m_attachToDrawableBone %s not found\n",getW3DModelDrawModuleData()->m_attachToDrawableBone.str()));
2020 }
2021 }
2022#endif
2023
2024 if (m_curState->m_flags & (1<<ADJUST_HEIGHT_BY_CONSTRUCTION_PERCENT))
2025 {
2026 const Object *obj = getDrawable()->getObject();
2027 if (obj)
2028 {
2029 Real pct = obj->getConstructionPercent();
2030 if (pct >= 0.0f)
2031 {
2032 Real height = obj->getGeometryInfo().getMaxHeightAbovePosition();
2033 mtx.Translate_Z(-height + (height * pct / 100.0f));
2034 }
2035 }
2036 }
2037}
2038
2039//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2040void W3DModelDraw::doDrawModule(const Matrix3D* transformMtx)
2041{
2042 // update whether or not we should be animating.
2043 setPauseAnimation( !getDrawable()->getShouldAnimate(getW3DModelDrawModuleData()->m_animationsRequirePower) );
2044
2045 Matrix3D scaledTransform;
2046 if (getDrawable()->getInstanceScale() != 1.0f)
2047 {
2048 // do custom scaling of the W3D model.
2049 scaledTransform = *transformMtx;
2050 scaledTransform.Scale(getDrawable()->getInstanceScale());
2051 transformMtx = &scaledTransform;
2052 if (m_renderObject)
2053 m_renderObject->Set_ObjectScale(getDrawable()->getInstanceScale());
2054 }
2055
2056 if (isAnimationComplete(m_renderObject))
2057 {
2058 if (m_curState != NULL && m_nextState != NULL)
2059 {
2060 //DEBUG_LOG(("transition %s is complete\n",m_curState->m_description.str()));
2061 const ModelConditionInfo* nextState = m_nextState;
2062 UnsignedInt nextDuration = m_nextStateAnimLoopDuration;
2063 m_nextState = NULL;
2064 m_nextStateAnimLoopDuration = NO_NEXT_DURATION;
2065 setModelState(nextState);
2066 if (nextDuration != NO_NEXT_DURATION)
2067 {
2068 //DEBUG_LOG(("restoring pending duration of %d frames\n",nextDuration));
2069 setAnimationLoopDuration(nextDuration);
2070 }
2071 }
2072
2073 if (m_renderObject &&
2074 m_curState != NULL &&
2075 m_whichAnimInCurState != -1)
2076 {
2077 if (m_curState->m_animations[m_whichAnimInCurState].isIdleAnim())
2078 {
2079 //DEBUG_LOG(("randomly switching to new idle state!\n"));
2080
2081 // state hasn't changed, if it's been awhile, switch the idle anim
2082 // (yes, that's right: pass curState for prevState)
2083 adjustAnimation(m_curState, -1.0);
2084 }
2085 else if (testFlagBit(m_curState->m_flags, RESTART_ANIM_WHEN_COMPLETE))
2086 {
2087 adjustAnimation(m_curState, -1.0);
2088 }
2089 }
2090 }
2091
2092 adjustAnimSpeedToMovementSpeed();
2093
2094 // set our position in the render object to our position of the drawable
2095 if (m_renderObject)
2096 {
2097 Matrix3D mtx = *transformMtx;
2098 adjustTransformMtx(mtx);
2099 m_renderObject->Set_Transform(mtx);
2100 }
2101
2102 handleClientTurretPositioning();
2103 recalcBonesForClientParticleSystems();
2104
2105 const W3DModelDrawModuleData *modData = getW3DModelDrawModuleData();
2106 if ( modData->m_particlesAttachedToAnimatedBones )
2107 updateBonesForClientParticleSystems();// LORENZEN ADDED THIS
2108 // IT REPOSITIONS PARTICLESYSTEMS TO TSTAY IN SYNC WITH ANIMATED BONES
2109
2110 handleClientRecoil();
2111
2112}

2116{
2117 const TransitionMap& transitionMap = getW3DModelDrawModuleData()->m_transitionMap;
2118 TransitionMap::const_iterator it = transitionMap.find(sig);
2119 if (it != transitionMap.end())
2120 {
2121 return &(*it).second;
2122 }
2123 return NULL;
2124}

2126//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2127Real W3DModelDraw::getCurrentAnimFraction() const
2128{
2129 if (m_curState != NULL
2130 && isAnyMaintainFrameFlagSet(m_curState->m_flags)
2131 && m_renderObject != NULL
2132 && m_renderObject->Class_ID() == RenderObjClass::CLASSID_HLOD)
2133 {
2134 float framenum, dummy;
2135 int mode, numFrames;
2136
2137 HLodClass* hlod = (HLodClass*)m_renderObject;
2138 /*HAnimClass* anim =*/ hlod->Peek_Animation_And_Info(framenum, numFrames, mode, dummy);
2139 if (framenum < 0.0)
2140 return 0.0;
2141 else if (framenum >= numFrames)
2142 return 1.0;
2143 else
2144 return (Real)framenum / ((Real)numFrames - 1);
2145 }
2146 else
2147 {
2148 return -1.0;
2149 }
2150}

2152//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2153void W3DModelDraw::adjustAnimation(const ModelConditionInfo* prevState, Real prevAnimFraction)
2154{
2155 if (!m_curState)
2156 return;
2157
2158 // if the current state has m_animations associated, do the right thing
2159 Int numAnims = m_curState->m_animations.size();
2160 if (numAnims > 0)
2161 {
2162 if (numAnims == 1)
2163 {
2164 m_whichAnimInCurState = 0;
2165 }
2166 else if (prevState == m_curState)
2167 {
2168 // select an idle anim different than the currently playing one
2169 Int animToAvoid = m_whichAnimInCurState;
2170 while (m_whichAnimInCurState == animToAvoid)
2171 m_whichAnimInCurState = GameClientRandomValue(0, numAnims-1);
2172 }
2173 else
2174 {
2175 m_whichAnimInCurState = GameClientRandomValue(0, numAnims-1);
2176 }
2177
2178 const W3DAnimationInfo& animInfo = m_curState->m_animations[m_whichAnimInCurState];
2179
2180 HAnimClass* animHandle = animInfo.getAnimHandle(); // note that this now returns an ADDREFED handle, which must be released by the caller!
2181 if (m_renderObject && animHandle)
2182 {
2183 Int startFrame = 0;
2184 if (m_curState->m_mode == RenderObjClass::ANIM_MODE_ONCE_BACKWARDS ||
2185 m_curState->m_mode == RenderObjClass::ANIM_MODE_LOOP_BACKWARDS)
2186 {
2187 startFrame = animHandle->Get_Num_Frames()-1;
2188 }
2189
2190 if (testFlagBit(m_curState->m_flags, RANDOMIZE_START_FRAME))
2191 {
2192 startFrame = GameClientRandomValue(0, animHandle->Get_Num_Frames()-1);
2193 }
2194 else if (testFlagBit(m_curState->m_flags, START_FRAME_FIRST))
2195 {
2196 startFrame = 0;
2197 }
2198 else if (testFlagBit(m_curState->m_flags, START_FRAME_LAST))
2199 {
2200 startFrame = animHandle->Get_Num_Frames()-1;
2201 }
2202 // order is important here: MAINTAIN_FRAME_ACROSS_STATES is overridden by the other bits, above.
2203 else if (isAnyMaintainFrameFlagSet(m_curState->m_flags) &&
2204 prevState &&
2205 prevState != m_curState &&
2206 isAnyMaintainFrameFlagSet(prevState->m_flags) &&
2207 isCommonMaintainFrameFlagSet(m_curState->m_flags, prevState->m_flags) &&
2208 prevAnimFraction >= 0.0)
2209 {
2210 startFrame = REAL_TO_INT(prevAnimFraction * animHandle->Get_Num_Frames()-1);
2211 }
2212
2213 m_renderObject->Set_Animation(animHandle, startFrame, m_curState->m_mode);
2214 REF_PTR_RELEASE(animHandle);
2215 animHandle = NULL;
2216
2217 if (m_renderObject->Class_ID() == RenderObjClass::CLASSID_HLOD)
2218 {
2219 HLodClass *hlod = (HLodClass*)m_renderObject;
2220 Real factor = GameClientRandomValueReal( m_curState->m_animMinSpeedFactor, m_curState->m_animMaxSpeedFactor );
2221 hlod->Set_Animation_Frame_Rate_Multiplier( factor );
2222 }
2223 }
2224
2225 }
2226 else
2227 {
2228 m_whichAnimInCurState = -1;
2229 }
2230
2231}
2232
2233//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2234Bool W3DModelDraw::setCurAnimDurationInMsec(Real desiredDurationInMsec)
2235{
2236 if (m_renderObject && m_renderObject->Class_ID() == RenderObjClass::CLASSID_HLOD)
2237 {
2238 HLodClass* hlod = (HLodClass*)m_renderObject;
2239 HAnimClass* anim = hlod->Peek_Animation();
2240 if (anim)
2241 {
2242 Real naturalDurationInMsec = anim->Get_Num_Frames() * 1000.0f / anim->Get_Frame_Rate();
2243 if (naturalDurationInMsec > 0.0f && desiredDurationInMsec > 0.0f)
2244 {
2245 Real multiplier = naturalDurationInMsec / desiredDurationInMsec;
2246 hlod->Set_Animation_Frame_Rate_Multiplier(multiplier);
2247 return true;
2248 }
2249 }
2250 }
2251
2252 return false;
2253}

2256Real W3DModelDraw::getCurAnimDistanceCovered() const
2257{
2258 if (m_curState != NULL && m_whichAnimInCurState >= 0)
2259 {
2260 const W3DAnimationInfo& animInfo = m_curState->m_animations[m_whichAnimInCurState];
2261 #if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
2262 if (TheSkateDistOverride != 0.0f)
2263 return TheSkateDistOverride;
2264 #endif
2265 return animInfo.getDistanceCovered();
2266 }
2267 return 0.0f;
2268}

2275static void doHideShowBoneSubObjs(Bool state, Int numSubObjects, Int boneIdx, RenderObjClass *fullObject, const HTreeClass *htree)
2276{
2277#if 1 //(gth) fixed and tested this version
2278 for (Int i=0; i < numSubObjects; i++)
2279 {
2280 bool is_child = false;
2281 Int parentBoneIndex = fullObject->Get_Sub_Object_Bone_Index(0, i);
2282
2283 while (parentBoneIndex != 0)
2284 {
2285 parentBoneIndex = htree->Get_Parent_Index(parentBoneIndex);
2286
2287 if (parentBoneIndex == boneIdx)
2288 {
2289 is_child = true;
2290 break;
2291 }
2292 }
2293
2294 if (is_child)
2295 {
2296 RenderObjClass* childObject = fullObject->Get_Sub_Object(i);
2297 childObject->Set_Hidden(state);
2298 childObject->Release_Ref();
2299 }
2300 }
2301#endif
2302#if 0 //old slow version
2303
2304 for (Int i=0; i < numSubObjects; i++)
2305 {
2306 Int childBoneIndex = fullObject->Get_Sub_Object_Bone_Index(0, i);
2307 Int parentIndex = htree->Get_Parent_Index(childBoneIndex);
2308 if (childBoneIndex == parentIndex)
2309 continue;
2310
2311 if (parentIndex == boneIdx) // this object has our subobject as parent so copy hide state
2312 {
2313 RenderObjClass* childObject = fullObject->Get_Sub_Object(i);
2314 // recurse down the hierarchy to hide all sub-children
2315 doHideShowBoneSubObjs(state, numSubObjects, childBoneIndex, fullObject, htree);
2316 childObject->Set_Hidden(state);
2317 childObject->Release_Ref();
2318 }
2319 }
2320#endif
2321}

2341//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2342void W3DModelDraw::doHideShowSubObjs(const std::vector<ModelConditionInfo::HideShowSubObjInfo>* vec)
2343{
2344 if (!m_renderObject)
2345 return;
2346
2347 if (!vec->empty())
2348 {
2349 for (std::vector<ModelConditionInfo::HideShowSubObjInfo>::const_iterator it = vec->begin(); it != vec->end(); ++it)
2350 {
2351 Int objIndex;
2352 RenderObjClass* subObj;
2353
2354 if ((subObj = m_renderObject->Get_Sub_Object_By_Name(it->subObjName.str(), &objIndex)) != NULL)
2355 {
2356 subObj->Set_Hidden(it->hide);
2357
2358 const HTreeClass *htree = m_renderObject->Get_HTree();
2359 if (htree)
2360 {
2361 //get the bone of this subobject so we can hide all other child objects that use this bone
2362 //as a parent.
2363 Int boneIdx = m_renderObject->Get_Sub_Object_Bone_Index(0, objIndex);
2364 doHideShowBoneSubObjs(it->hide, m_renderObject->Get_Num_Sub_Objects(), boneIdx, m_renderObject, htree);
2365 }
2366 subObj->Release_Ref();
2367 }
2368 else
2369 {
2370 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: SubObject %s not found (%s)!\n",it->subObjName.str(),getDrawable()->getTemplate()->getName().str()));
2371 }
2372 }
2373 }
2374
2375 //Kris (added Aug 2002)
2376 //This is really important as it allows a person to override modelcondition show/hide objects. Used by the A10 strike
2377 //September 2002 -- now used by the UpgradeSubObject system.
2378 if( !m_subObjectVec.empty() )
2379 {
2380 updateSubObjects();
2381 }
2382}

2400//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2401/*
2402 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2403 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2404 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2405
2406 This function must not EVER do ANYTHING which can in any way, shape, or form
2407 affect GameLogic in any way; if it does, net desyncs will occur and we
2408 will all lose our jobs. This must remain pure-client-only, and ensure
2409 that nothing it does can be detected, even in read-only form, by GameLogic!
2410
2411 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2412 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2413 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2414*/
2415void W3DModelDraw::handleClientTurretPositioning()
2416{
2417 if (!m_curState || !(m_curState->m_validStuff & ModelConditionInfo::TURRETS_VALID))
2418 return;
2419
2420 for (int tslot = 0; tslot < MAX_TURRETS; ++tslot)
2421 {
2422 const ModelConditionInfo::TurretInfo& tur = m_curState->m_turrets[tslot];
2423 Real turretAngle = 0;
2424 Real turretPitch = 0;
2425 if (tur.m_turretAngleBone || tur.m_turretPitchBone)
2426 {
2427 const Object *obj = getDrawable()->getObject();
2428 if (obj)
2429 {
2430 const AIUpdateInterface* ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
2431 if (ai)
2432 ai->getTurretRotAndPitch((WhichTurretType)tslot, &turretAngle, &turretPitch);
2433 }
2434
2435 // do turret, if any
2436 if (tur.m_turretAngleBone != 0)
2437 {
2438 if (m_curState)
2439 turretAngle += tur.m_turretArtAngle;
2440 Matrix3D turretXfrm(1);
2441 turretXfrm.Rotate_Z(turretAngle);
2442 if (m_renderObject)
2443 {
2444 m_renderObject->Capture_Bone( tur.m_turretAngleBone );
2445 m_renderObject->Control_Bone( tur.m_turretAngleBone, turretXfrm );
2446 }
2447 }
2448
2449 // do turret pitch, if any
2450 if (tur.m_turretPitchBone != 0)
2451 {
2452 if (m_curState)
2453 turretPitch += tur.m_turretArtPitch;
2454 Matrix3D turretPitchXfrm(1);
2455 turretPitchXfrm.Rotate_Y(-turretPitch);
2456 if (m_renderObject)
2457 {
2458 m_renderObject->Capture_Bone( tur.m_turretPitchBone );
2459 m_renderObject->Control_Bone( tur.m_turretPitchBone, turretPitchXfrm );
2460 }
2461 }
2462 }
2463 } // next tslot
2464}

2483//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2484/*
2485 Note that, strictly speaking this code is WRONG, since it assumes it will get called every frame,
2486 but in fact, will only get called every frame that it is visible. In practice, this isn't a big problem,
2487 but...
2488
2489 @todo fix me someday (srj)
2490*/
2491void W3DModelDraw::handleClientRecoil()
2492{
2493 const W3DModelDrawModuleData* d = getW3DModelDrawModuleData();
2494 if (!(m_curState->m_validStuff & ModelConditionInfo::BARRELS_VALID))
2495 {
2496 return;
2497 }
2498
2499 // do recoil, if any
2500 for (int wslot = 0; wslot < WEAPONSLOT_COUNT; ++wslot)
2501 {
2502 if (!m_curState->m_hasRecoilBonesOrMuzzleFlashes[wslot])
2503 continue;
2504
2505 const ModelConditionInfo::WeaponBarrelInfoVec& barrels = m_curState->m_weaponBarrelInfoVec[wslot];
2506 WeaponRecoilInfoVec& recoils = m_weaponRecoilInfoVec[wslot];
2507 Int count = barrels.size();
2508 Int recoilCount = recoils.size();
2509 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(count == recoilCount, ("Barrel count != recoil count!"));
2510 count = (count>recoilCount)?recoilCount:count;
2511 for (Int i = 0; i < count; ++i)
2512 {
2513 if (barrels[i].m_muzzleFlashBone != 0)
2514 {
2515 Bool hidden = recoils[i].m_state != WeaponRecoilInfo::RECOIL_START;
2516 //DEBUG_LOG(("adjust muzzleflash %08lx for Draw %08lx state %s to %d at frame %d\n",subObjToHide,this,m_curState->m_description.str(),hidden?1:0,TheGameLogic->getFrame()));
2517 barrels[i].setMuzzleFlashHidden(m_renderObject, hidden);
2518 }
2519
2520 const Real TINY_RECOIL = 0.01f;
2521 if (barrels[i].m_recoilBone != 0)
2522 {
2523 switch (recoils[i].m_state )
2524 {
2525 case WeaponRecoilInfo::IDLE:
2526 // nothing
2527 break;
2528
2529 case WeaponRecoilInfo::RECOIL_START:
2530 case WeaponRecoilInfo::RECOIL:
2531 recoils[i].m_shift += recoils[i].m_recoilRate;
2532 recoils[i].m_recoilRate *= d->m_recoilDamping; // recoil decelerates
2533 if (recoils[i].m_shift >= d->m_maxRecoil)
2534 {
2535 recoils[i].m_shift = d->m_maxRecoil;
2536 recoils[i].m_state = WeaponRecoilInfo::SETTLE;
2537 }
2538 else if (fabs(recoils[i].m_recoilRate) < TINY_RECOIL)
2539 {
2540 recoils[i].m_state = WeaponRecoilInfo::SETTLE;
2541 }
2542 break;
2543
2544 case WeaponRecoilInfo::SETTLE:
2545 recoils[i].m_shift -= d->m_recoilSettle;
2546 if (recoils[i].m_shift <= 0.0f)
2547 {
2548 recoils[i].m_shift = 0.0f;
2549 recoils[i].m_state = WeaponRecoilInfo::IDLE;
2550 }
2551 break;
2552 }
2553
2554 Matrix3D gunXfrm;
2555 gunXfrm.Make_Identity();
2556 gunXfrm.Translate_X( -recoils[i].m_shift );
2557 //DEBUG_ASSERTLOG(recoils[i].m_shift==0.0f,("adjust bone %d by %f\n",recoils[i].m_recoilBone,recoils[i].m_shift));
2558
2559 if (m_renderObject)
2560 {
2561 m_renderObject->Capture_Bone( barrels[i].m_recoilBone );
2562 m_renderObject->Control_Bone( barrels[i].m_recoilBone, gunXfrm );
2563 }
2564 }
2565 else
2566 {
2567 recoils[i].m_state = WeaponRecoilInfo::IDLE;
2568 //DEBUG_LOG(("reset Draw %08lx state %08lx\n",this,m_curState));
2569 }
2570 }
2571 }
2572}
2573
2574//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2575/*
2576 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2577 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2578 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2579
2580 This function must not EVER do ANYTHING which can in any way, shape, or form
2581 affect GameLogic in any way; if it does, net desyncs will occur and we
2582 will all lose our jobs. This must remain pure-client-only, and ensure
2583 that nothing it does can be detected, even in read-only form, by GameLogic!
2584
2585 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2586 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2587 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2588*/
2589void W3DModelDraw::recalcBonesForClientParticleSystems()
2590{
2591 if (m_needRecalcBoneParticleSystems)
2592 {
2593 const Drawable* drawable = getDrawable();
2594 if (drawable != NULL )
2595 {
2596
2597 if( m_curState != NULL && drawable->testDrawableStatus( DRAWABLE_STATUS_NO_STATE_PARTICLES ) == FALSE )
2598 {
2599 for (std::vector<ParticleSysBoneInfo>::const_iterator it = m_curState->m_particleSysBones.begin(); it != m_curState->m_particleSysBones.end(); ++it)
2600 {
2601 ParticleSystem *sys = TheParticleSystemManager->createParticleSystem(it->particleSystemTemplate);
2602 if (sys != NULL)
2603 {
2604 Coord3D pos;
2605 pos.zero();
2606 Real rotation = 0.0f;
2607
2608 Int boneIndex = m_renderObject ? m_renderObject->Get_Bone_Index(it->boneName.str()) : 0;
2609 if (boneIndex != 0)
2610 {
2611 // ugh... kill the mtx so we get it in modelspace, not world space
2612 Matrix3D originalTransform = m_renderObject->Get_Transform(); // save the transform
2613 Matrix3D tmp(true);
2614 tmp.Scale(getDrawable()->getScale());
2615 m_renderObject->Set_Transform(tmp); // set to identity transform
2616
2617 const Matrix3D boneTransform = m_renderObject->Get_Bone_Transform(boneIndex);
2618 Vector3 vpos = boneTransform.Get_Translation();
2619 rotation = boneTransform.Get_Z_Rotation();
2620
2621 m_renderObject->Set_Transform(originalTransform); // restore it
2622
2623 pos.x = vpos.X;
2624 pos.y = vpos.Y;
2625 pos.z = vpos.Z;
2626 }
2627
2628 // got the bone position...
2629 sys->setPosition(&pos);
2630
2631 // and the direction, so that the system is oriented like the bone is
2632 sys->rotateLocalTransformZ(rotation);
2633
2634 // Attatch it to the object...
2635 sys->attachToDrawable(drawable);
2636
2637 // important: mark it as do-not-save, since we'll just re-create it when we reload.
2638 sys->setSaveable(FALSE);
2639
2640 if (drawable->isDrawableEffectivelyHidden() || m_fullyObscuredByShroud)
2641 {
2642 sys->stop(); // don't start the systems for drawables that are hidden.
2643 }
2644
2645 // store the particle system id so we can kill it later.
2646
2647 ParticleSysTrackerType tracker;
2648 tracker.id = sys->getSystemID();
2649 tracker.boneIndex = boneIndex;
2650
2651 m_particleSystemIDs.push_back( tracker );
2652 }
2653 }
2654 }
2655 }
2656 m_needRecalcBoneParticleSystems = false;
2657 }
2658}
2659

2662//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2663/*
2664 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2665 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2666 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2667
2668 This function must not EVER do ANYTHING which can in any way, shape, or form
2669 affect GameLogic in any way; if it does, net desyncs will occur and we
2670 will all lose our jobs. This must remain pure-client-only, and ensure
2671 that nothing it does can be detected, even in read-only form, by GameLogic!
2672
2673 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2674 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2675 DANGER WARNING READ ME
2676*/
2677Bool W3DModelDraw::updateBonesForClientParticleSystems()
2678{
2679 const Drawable* drawable = getDrawable();
2680 if (drawable != NULL && m_curState != NULL && m_renderObject != NULL )
2681 {
2682
2683// Matrix3D originalTransform = m_renderObject->Get_Transform();
2684// Matrix3D tmp = originalTransform;
2685 // Vector3 zeroTranslation(0,0,0);
2686 // tmp.Set_Translation( zeroTranslation );
2687 // tmp.Scale(drawable->getScale());
2688// m_renderObject->Set_Transform(tmp);
2689
2690
2691
2692 for (std::vector<ParticleSysTrackerType>::const_iterator it = m_particleSystemIDs.begin(); it != m_particleSystemIDs.end(); ++it)
2693 {
2694 ParticleSystem *sys = TheParticleSystemManager->findParticleSystem((*it).id);
2695 Int boneIndex = (*it).boneIndex;
2696 if ( (sys != NULL) && (boneIndex != 0) )
2697 {
2698 const Matrix3D boneTransform = m_renderObject->Get_Bone_Transform(boneIndex);// just a little worried about state changes
2699
2700 Vector3 vpos = boneTransform.Get_Translation();
2701
2702 Coord3D pos;
2703 pos.x = vpos.X;
2704 pos.y = vpos.Y;
2705 pos.z = vpos.Z;
2706
2707 sys->setPosition(&pos);
2708
2709 Real orientation = boneTransform.Get_Z_Rotation();
2710 sys->rotateLocalTransformZ(orientation);
2711
2712 sys->setLocalTransform(&boneTransform);
2713 sys->setSkipParentXfrm(true);
2714
2715 }
2716 }// next praticle system
2717
2718
2719// m_renderObject->Set_Transform(originalTransform);
2720
2721 }// end if Drawable
2722
2723 return TRUE;
2724
2725}
