2730//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2731void W3DModelDraw::setTerrainDecal(TerrainDecalType type)
2732{
2733 if (m_terrainDecal)
2734 m_terrainDecal->release();
2735
2736 m_terrainDecal = NULL;
2737
2738 if (type == TERRAIN_DECAL_NONE || type >= TERRAIN_DECAL_MAX)
2739 //turning off decals on this object. (or bad value.)
2740 return;
2741
2742 const ThingTemplate *tmplate=getDrawable()->getTemplate();
2743
2744 //create a new terrain decal
2745 Shadow::ShadowTypeInfo decalInfo;
2746 decalInfo.allowUpdates = FALSE; //shadow image will never update
2747 decalInfo.allowWorldAlign = TRUE; //shadow image will wrap around world objects
2748 decalInfo.m_type = SHADOW_ALPHA_DECAL;
2749
2750 //decalInfo.m_type = SHADOW_ADDITIVE_DECAL;//temporary kluge to test graphics
2751
2752 if (type == TERRAIN_DECAL_SHADOW_TEXTURE)
2753 strcpy(decalInfo.m_ShadowName,tmplate->getShadowTextureName().str());
2754 else
2755 strcpy(decalInfo.m_ShadowName,TerrainDecalTextureName[type]);
2756 decalInfo.m_sizeX = tmplate->getShadowSizeX();
2757 decalInfo.m_sizeY = tmplate->getShadowSizeY();
2758 decalInfo.m_offsetX = tmplate->getShadowOffsetX();
2759 decalInfo.m_offsetY = tmplate->getShadowOffsetY();
2760 if (TheProjectedShadowManager)
2761 m_terrainDecal = TheProjectedShadowManager->addDecal(m_renderObject,&decalInfo);
2762 if (m_terrainDecal)
2763 { m_terrainDecal->enableShadowInvisible(m_fullyObscuredByShroud);
2764 m_terrainDecal->enableShadowRender(m_shadowEnabled);
2765 }
2766}

2782 }

2786//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2787void W3DModelDraw::nukeCurrentRender(Matrix3D* xform)
2788{
2789 // this needs to be "dirtied" so that the new pausing of the animation will be triggered.
2790 m_pauseAnimation = false;
2791
2792 // changing geometry, so we need to remove shadow if present
2793 if (m_shadow)
2794 m_shadow->release();
2795 m_shadow = NULL;
2796
2797 if(m_terrainDecal)
2798 m_terrainDecal->release();
2799 m_terrainDecal = NULL;
2800
2801 // remove existing render object from the scene
2802 if (m_renderObject)
2803 {
2804 // save the transform for the new model
2805 if (xform)
2806 *xform = m_renderObject->Get_Transform();
2807 W3DDisplay::m_3DScene->Remove_Render_Object(m_renderObject);
2808 REF_PTR_RELEASE(m_renderObject);
2809 m_renderObject = NULL;
2810 }
2811 else
2812 {
2813 if (xform)
2814 {
2815 *xform = *getDrawable()->getTransformMatrix();
2816 }
2817 }
2818}
2819

2821#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL) //art wants to see buildings without flags as a test.
2822void W3DModelDraw::hideGarrisonFlags(Bool hide)
2823{
2824 if (!m_renderObject)
2825 return;
2826
2827 Int objIndex;
2828 RenderObjClass* subObj;
2829
2830 if ((subObj = m_renderObject->Get_Sub_Object_By_Name("POLE", &objIndex)) != NULL)
2831 {
2832 subObj->Set_Hidden(hide);
2833
2834 const HTreeClass *htree = m_renderObject->Get_HTree();
2835 if (htree)
2836 {
2837 //get the bone of this subobject so we can hide all other child objects that use this bone
2838 //as a parent.
2839 Int boneIdx = m_renderObject->Get_Sub_Object_Bone_Index(0, objIndex);
2840 doHideShowBoneSubObjs(hide, m_renderObject->Get_Num_Sub_Objects(), boneIdx, m_renderObject, htree);
2841 }
2842 subObj->Release_Ref();
2843 }
2844}
2845#endif

2847//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2849void W3DModelDraw::hideAllHeadlights(Bool hide)
2850{
2851 if (m_renderObject)
2852 {
2853 for (Int subObj = 0; subObj < m_renderObject->Get_Num_Sub_Objects(); subObj++)
2854 {
2855 RenderObjClass* test = m_renderObject->Get_Sub_Object(subObj);
2856 if (strstr(test->Get_Name(),"HEADLIGHT"))
2857 {
2858 test->Set_Hidden(hide);
2859 }
2860 test->Release_Ref();
2861 }
2862 }
2863}

2865//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2866void W3DModelDraw::hideAllMuzzleFlashes(const ModelConditionInfo* state, RenderObjClass* renderObject)
2867{
2868 if (!state || !renderObject)
2869 return;
2870
2871 if (!(state->m_validStuff & ModelConditionInfo::BARRELS_VALID))
2872 {
2873 return;
2874 }
2875
2876 for (int wslot = 0; wslot < WEAPONSLOT_COUNT; ++wslot)
2877 {
2878 if (!state->m_hasRecoilBonesOrMuzzleFlashes[wslot])
2879 continue;
2880
2881 const ModelConditionInfo::WeaponBarrelInfoVec& barrels = state->m_weaponBarrelInfoVec[wslot];
2882 for (ModelConditionInfo::WeaponBarrelInfoVec::const_iterator it = barrels.begin(); it != barrels.end(); ++it)
2883 {
2884 if (it->m_muzzleFlashBone != 0)
2885 {
2886 it->setMuzzleFlashHidden(renderObject, true);
2887 }
2888 }
2889 }
2890}
2891
2892//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2893static Bool turretNamesDiffer(const ModelConditionInfo* a, const ModelConditionInfo* b)
2894{
2895 if (!(a->m_validStuff & ModelConditionInfo::TURRETS_VALID) || !(b->m_validStuff & ModelConditionInfo::TURRETS_VALID))
2896 {
2897 return true;
2898 }
2899 for (int i = 0; i < MAX_TURRETS; ++i)
2900 if (a->m_turrets[i].m_turretAngleNameKey != b->m_turrets[i].m_turretAngleNameKey ||
2901 a->m_turrets[i].m_turretPitchNameKey != b->m_turrets[i].m_turretPitchNameKey)
2902 return true;
2903
2904 return false;
2905}
2906
2907//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2910//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2911void W3DModelDraw::setModelState(const ModelConditionInfo* newState)
2912{
2913 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(newState, ("invalid state in W3DModelDraw::setModelState\n"));
2914
2915#ifdef DEBUG_OBJECT_ID_EXISTS
2916 if (getDrawable() && getDrawable()->getObject() && getDrawable()->getObject()->getID() == TheObjectIDToDebug)
2917 {
2918 DEBUG_LOG(("REQUEST switching to state %s for obj %s %d\n",newState->m_description.str(),getDrawable()->getObject()->getTemplate()->getName().str(),getDrawable()->getObject()->getID()));
2919 }
2920#endif
2921 const ModelConditionInfo* nextState = NULL;
2922 if (m_curState != NULL && newState != NULL)
2923 {
2924 // if the requested state is the current state (and nothing is pending),
2925 // or if the requested state is pending, just punt.
2926 //
2927 // note that if the requested state matches the current state AND
2928 // we also have a pending state, then we nuke both of 'em. This sounds
2929 // weird, but is deliberate: nextState and newState will always be "real" states (or null),
2930 // leaving us these possibilities:
2931 //
2932 // -- curState is a transition state
2933 // --in this case, new state should take precedence (unless there's a wait-to-finish marking,
2934 // which would be handled by the else clause)
2935 //
2936 // -- curState is a real state, nextState is a real state with a wait-to-finish clause
2937 // -- if curState == newState, presume that we should restart curState, thus punting thepending nextState
2938 // -- if curState != newState, presume we should switch to it, thus punting curState and nextState
2939 //
2940 // -- curState is a real state, nextState is a real state without a wait-to-finish clause
2941 // -- should be impossible!
2942
2943 if ((m_curState == newState && m_nextState == NULL) ||
2944 (m_curState != NULL && m_nextState == newState))
2945 {
2946#ifdef DEBUG_OBJECT_ID_EXISTS
2947 if (getDrawable() && getDrawable()->getObject() && getDrawable()->getObject()->getID() == TheObjectIDToDebug)
2948 {
2949 DEBUG_LOG(("IGNORE duplicate state %s for obj %s %d\n",newState->m_description.str(),getDrawable()->getObject()->getTemplate()->getName().str(),getDrawable()->getObject()->getID()));
2950 }
2951#endif
2952 // I don't think he'll be interested...
2953 // he's already got one, you see
2954 return;
2955 }
2956 // check for allow-to-finish implicit transitions
2957 else if (newState != m_curState &&
2958 newState->m_allowToFinishKey != NAMEKEY_INVALID &&
2959 newState->m_allowToFinishKey == m_curState->m_transitionKey &&
2960 m_renderObject &&
2961 !isAnimationComplete(m_renderObject))
2962 {
2963#ifdef DEBUG_OBJECT_ID_EXISTS
2964 if (getDrawable() && getDrawable()->getObject() && getDrawable()->getObject()->getID() == TheObjectIDToDebug)
2965 {
2966 DEBUG_LOG(("ALLOW_TO_FINISH state %s for obj %s %d\n",newState->m_description.str(),getDrawable()->getObject()->getTemplate()->getName().str(),getDrawable()->getObject()->getID()));
2967 }
2968#endif
2969 m_nextState = newState;
2970 m_nextStateAnimLoopDuration = NO_NEXT_DURATION;
2971 return;
2972 }
2973 // check for a normal->normal state transition
2974 else if (newState != m_curState &&
2975 m_curState->m_transitionKey != NAMEKEY_INVALID &&
2976 newState->m_transitionKey != NAMEKEY_INVALID)
2977 {
2978 TransitionSig sig = buildTransitionSig(m_curState->m_transitionKey, newState->m_transitionKey);
2979 const ModelConditionInfo* transState = findTransitionForSig(sig);
2980 if (transState != NULL)
2981 {
2982#ifdef DEBUG_OBJECT_ID_EXISTS
2983 if (getDrawable() && getDrawable()->getObject() && getDrawable()->getObject()->getID() == TheObjectIDToDebug)
2984 {
2985 DEBUG_LOG(("using TRANSITION state %s before requested state %s for obj %s %d\n",transState->m_description.str(),newState->m_description.str(),getDrawable()->getObject()->getTemplate()->getName().str(),getDrawable()->getObject()->getID()));
2986 }
2987#endif
2988 nextState = newState;
2989 newState = transState;
2990 }
2991 }
2992 }
2993
2994 // get this here, before we change anything... we'll need it to pass to adjustAnimation (srj)
2995 Real prevAnimFraction = getCurrentAnimFraction();
2996
2997 //
2998 // Set up any particle effects for the new model. Also stop the old ones, note that we
2999 // will never allow the placement of new ones if the status bit is set that tells us
3000 // we should not automatically create particle systems for the model condition states
3001 //
3002 if( getDrawable()->testDrawableStatus( DRAWABLE_STATUS_NO_STATE_PARTICLES ) == FALSE )
3003 m_needRecalcBoneParticleSystems = true;
3004
3005 // always stop particle systems now
3006 stopClientParticleSystems();
3007
3008 // and always hide muzzle flashes, in case modelstate and model have crossed at the same time
3009 hideAllMuzzleFlashes(newState, m_renderObject);
3010
3011 // note that different states might use the same model; for these, don't go thru the
3012 // expense of creating a new render-object. (exception: if color is changing, or subobjs are changing,
3013 // or a few other things...)
3014 if (m_curState == NULL ||
3015 newState->m_modelName != m_curState->m_modelName ||
3016 turretNamesDiffer(newState, m_curState)
3017 // srj sez: I'm not sure why we want to do the "hard stuff" if we have projectile bones; I think
3018 // it is a holdover from days gone by when bones were handled quite differently, rather than being cached.
3019 // but doing this hard stuff is a lot more work, and I think it's unnecessary, so let's remove this.
3020 //|| (newState->m_validStuff & ModelConditionInfo::HAS_PROJECTILE_BONES)
3021 )
3022 {
3023 Matrix3D transform;
3024 nukeCurrentRender(&transform);
3025 Drawable* draw = getDrawable();
3026
3027 // create a new render object and set into drawable
3028 if (newState->m_modelName.isEmpty())
3029 {
3030 m_renderObject = NULL;
3031 }
3032 else
3033 {
3034 m_renderObject = W3DDisplay::m_assetManager->Create_Render_Obj(newState->m_modelName.str(), draw->getScale(), m_hexColor);
3035 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(m_renderObject, ("*** ASSET ERROR: Model %s not found!\n",newState->m_modelName.str()));
3036 }
3037
3038 //BONEPOS_LOG(("validateStuff() from within W3DModelDraw::setModelState()\n"));
3039 //BONEPOS_DUMPREAL(draw->getScale());
3040
3041 newState->validateStuff(m_renderObject, draw->getScale(), getW3DModelDrawModuleData()->m_extraPublicBones);
3042 // ensure that any muzzle flashes from the *new* state, start out hidden...
3043// hideAllMuzzleFlashes(newState, m_renderObject);//moved to above
3044 rebuildWeaponRecoilInfo(newState);
3045 doHideShowSubObjs(&newState->m_hideShowVec);
3046
3047#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL) //art wants to see buildings without flags as a test.
3048 if (TheGlobalData->m_hideGarrisonFlags && draw->isKindOf(KINDOF_STRUCTURE))
3049 hideGarrisonFlags(TRUE);
3050#endif
3051
3052 const ThingTemplate *tmplate = draw->getTemplate();
3053
3054 // set up tracks, if not already set.
3055 if (m_renderObject &&
3056 TheGlobalData->m_makeTrackMarks &&
3057 !m_trackRenderObject &&
3058 TheTerrainTracksRenderObjClassSystem != NULL &&
3059 !getW3DModelDrawModuleData()->m_trackFile.isEmpty())
3060 {
3061 m_trackRenderObject = TheTerrainTracksRenderObjClassSystem->bindTrack(m_renderObject, 1.0f*MAP_XY_FACTOR, getW3DModelDrawModuleData()->m_trackFile.str());
3062 if (draw && m_trackRenderObject)
3063 m_trackRenderObject->setOwnerDrawable(draw);
3064 }
3065
3066 // set up shadows
3067 if (m_renderObject && TheW3DShadowManager && tmplate->getShadowType() != SHADOW_NONE)
3068 {
3069 Shadow::ShadowTypeInfo shadowInfo;
3070 strcpy(shadowInfo.m_ShadowName, tmplate->getShadowTextureName().str());
3071 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(shadowInfo.m_ShadowName[0] != '\0', ("this should be validated in ThingTemplate now"));
3072 shadowInfo.allowUpdates = FALSE; //shadow image will never update
3073 shadowInfo.allowWorldAlign = TRUE; //shadow image will wrap around world objects
3074 shadowInfo.m_type = (ShadowType)tmplate->getShadowType();
3075 shadowInfo.m_sizeX = tmplate->getShadowSizeX();
3076 shadowInfo.m_sizeY = tmplate->getShadowSizeY();
3077 shadowInfo.m_offsetX = tmplate->getShadowOffsetX();
3078 shadowInfo.m_offsetY = tmplate->getShadowOffsetY();
3079 m_shadow = TheW3DShadowManager->addShadow(m_renderObject, &shadowInfo, draw);
3080 if (m_shadow)
3081 { m_shadow->enableShadowInvisible(m_fullyObscuredByShroud);
3082 m_shadow->enableShadowRender(m_shadowEnabled);
3083 }
3084 }
3085
3086 if( m_renderObject )
3087 {
3088 // set collision type for render object. Used by WW3D2 collision code.
3089 if (tmplate->isKindOf(KINDOF_SELECTABLE))
3090 {
3091 m_renderObject->Set_Collision_Type( PICK_TYPE_SELECTABLE );
3092 }
3093
3094 if( tmplate->isKindOf( KINDOF_SHRUBBERY ))
3095 {
3096 m_renderObject->Set_Collision_Type( PICK_TYPE_SHRUBBERY );
3097 }
3098 if( tmplate->isKindOf( KINDOF_MINE ))
3099 {
3100 m_renderObject->Set_Collision_Type( PICK_TYPE_MINES );
3101 }
3102 if( tmplate->isKindOf( KINDOF_FORCEATTACKABLE ))
3103 {
3104 m_renderObject->Set_Collision_Type( PICK_TYPE_FORCEATTACKABLE );
3105 }
3106 if( tmplate->isKindOf( KINDOF_CLICK_THROUGH ))
3107 {
3108 m_renderObject->Set_Collision_Type( 0 );
3109 }
3110
3111 Object *obj = draw->getObject();
3112 if( obj )
3113 {
3114
3115 // for non bridge objects we adjust some collision types
3116 if( obj->isKindOf( KINDOF_BRIDGE ) == FALSE &&
3117 obj->isKindOf( KINDOF_BRIDGE_TOWER ) == FALSE )
3118 {
3119
3120 if( obj->isKindOf( KINDOF_STRUCTURE ) && draw->getModelConditionFlags().test( MODELCONDITION_RUBBLE ) )
3121 {
3122 //A dead building, -- don't allow the user to click on rubble! Treat it as a location instead.
3123 m_renderObject->Set_Collision_Type( 0 );
3124 }
3125 else if( obj->isEffectivelyDead() )
3126 {
3127 //A dead object, -- don't allow the user to click on rubble/hulks! Treat it as a location instead.
3128 m_renderObject->Set_Collision_Type( 0 );
3129 }
3130 }
3131 }
3132
3133 // add render object to our scene
3134 W3DDisplay::m_3DScene->Add_Render_Object(m_renderObject);
3135
3136 // tie in our drawable as the user data pointer in the render object
3137 m_renderObject->Set_User_Data(draw->getDrawableInfo());
3138
3139 setTerrainDecal(draw->getTerrainDecalType());
3140
3141 //We created a new render object so we need to preserve the visibility state
3142 //of the previous render object.
3143 if (draw->isDrawableEffectivelyHidden())
3144 {
3145 m_renderObject->Set_Hidden(TRUE);
3146 if (m_shadow)
3147 m_shadow->enableShadowRender(FALSE);
3148 m_shadowEnabled = FALSE;
3149 }
3150
3151 //
3152 // set the transform for the new model to that we saved before, we do this so that the
3153 // model transition is smooth and will immediately appear at the same orientation and location
3154 // as the previous one
3155 //
3156 m_renderObject->Set_Transform(transform);
3157 onRenderObjRecreated();
3158 }
3159 }
3160 else
3161 {
3162
3163 //BONEPOS_LOG(("validateStuff() from within W3DModelDraw::setModelState()\n"));
3164 //BONEPOS_DUMPREAL(getDrawable()->getScale());
3165
3166 newState->validateStuff(m_renderObject, getDrawable()->getScale(), getW3DModelDrawModuleData()->m_extraPublicBones);
3167 rebuildWeaponRecoilInfo(newState);
3168
3169 // ensure that any muzzle flashes from the *previous* state, are hidden...
3170// hideAllMuzzleFlashes(m_curState, m_renderObject);// moved to above
3171
3172 doHideShowSubObjs(&newState->m_hideShowVec);
3173 }
3174 hideAllHeadlights(m_hideHeadlights);
3175
3176 const ModelConditionInfo* prevState = m_curState; // save, to pass to adjustAnimation (could be null)
3177 m_curState = newState;
3178 m_nextState = nextState;
3179 m_nextStateAnimLoopDuration = NO_NEXT_DURATION;
3180 adjustAnimation(prevState, prevAnimFraction);
3181}

3183//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3184void W3DModelDraw::replaceModelConditionState(const ModelConditionFlags& c)
3185{
3186 m_hideHeadlights = c.test(MODELCONDITION_NIGHT) ? false : true;
3187
3188 const ModelConditionInfo* info = findBestInfo(c);
3189 if (info)
3190 setModelState(info);
3191
3192 hideAllHeadlights(m_hideHeadlights);
3193}
3194
3195//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3196void W3DModelDraw::setSelectable(Bool selectable)
3197{
3198 // set collision type for render object. Used by WW3D2 collision code.
3199 if( m_renderObject )
3200 {
3201 int current = m_renderObject->Get_Collision_Type();
3202 if (selectable) {
3203 current |= PICK_TYPE_SELECTABLE;
3204 } else {
3205 current &= ~PICK_TYPE_SELECTABLE;
3206 }
3207 m_renderObject->Set_Collision_Type(current);
3208 } // end if
3209}

3212void W3DModelDraw::replaceIndicatorColor(Color color)
3213{
3214 if (!getW3DModelDrawModuleData()->m_okToChangeModelColor)
3215 return;
3216
3217 if (getRenderObject())
3218 {
3219 Int newColor = (color == 0) ? 0 : (color | 0xFF000000);
3220 if (newColor != m_hexColor)
3221 {
3222 m_hexColor = newColor;
3223
3224 // set these to NULL to force a regen of everything in setModelState.
3225 const ModelConditionInfo* tmp = m_curState;
3226 m_curState = NULL;
3227 m_nextState = NULL;
3228 m_nextStateAnimLoopDuration = NO_NEXT_DURATION;
3229 setModelState(tmp);
3230 }

3252//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3253Bool W3DModelDraw::getProjectileLaunchOffset(
3254 const ModelConditionFlags& condition,
3255 WeaponSlotType wslot,
3256 Int specificBarrelToUse,
3257 Matrix3D* launchPos,
3258 WhichTurretType tur,
3259 Coord3D* turretRotPos,
3260 Coord3D* turretPitchPos
3261) const
3262{
3263 /*
3264 Note, this recalcs the state every time, rather than using m_curState,
3265 because m_curState could be a transition state, and we really need
3266 to get the pristine bone(s) for the state that logic believes to be current,
3267 not the one the client might currently be using...
3268 */
3269 const ModelConditionInfo* stateToUse = findBestInfo(condition);
3270 if (!stateToUse)
3271 {
3272 CRCDEBUG_LOG(("can't find best info\n"));
3273 //BONEPOS_LOG(("can't find best info\n"));
3274 return false;
3275 }
3276#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
3277 CRCDEBUG_LOG(("W3DModelDraw::getProjectileLaunchOffset() for %s\n",
3278 stateToUse->getDescription().str()));
3279#endif
3280
3281#ifdef INTENSE_DEBUG
3282 AsciiString flags;
3283 for (Int i=0; i<condition.size(); ++i)
3284 {
3285 if (condition.test(i))
3286 {
3287 if (flags.isNotEmpty())
3288 flags.concat(',');
3289 flags.concat(condition.getNameFromSingleBit(i));
3290 }
3291 }
3292#endif // INTENSE_DEBUG
3293
3294 const W3DModelDrawModuleData* d = getW3DModelDrawModuleData();
3295 //CRCDEBUG_LOG(("validateStuffs() from within W3DModelDraw::getProjectileLaunchOffset()\n"));
3296 //DUMPREAL(getDrawable()->getScale());
3297 //BONEPOS_LOG(("validateStuffs() from within W3DModelDraw::getProjectileLaunchOffset()\n"));
3298 //BONEPOS_DUMPREAL(getDrawable()->getScale());
3299 stateToUse->validateStuff(NULL, getDrawable()->getScale(), d->m_extraPublicBones);
3300
3301 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(stateToUse->m_transitionSig == NO_TRANSITION,
3302 ("It is never legal to getProjectileLaunchOffset from a Transition state (they vary on a per-client basis)... however, we can fix this (see srj)\n"));
3303
3304 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(specificBarrelToUse >= 0, ("specificBarrelToUse should now always be explicit"));
3305
3306#ifdef CACHE_ATTACH_BONE
3307#else
3308 Coord3D techOffset;
3309 techOffset.zero();
3310 // must use pristine bone here since the result is used by logic
3311 Matrix3D pivot;
3312 if (d->m_attachToDrawableBone.isNotEmpty() &&
3313 getDrawable()->getPristineBonePositions( d->m_attachToDrawableBone.str(), 0, NULL, &pivot, 1 ) == 1)
3314 {
3315 pivot.Pre_Rotate_Z(getDrawable()->getOrientation());
3316 techOffset.x = pivot.Get_X_Translation();
3317 techOffset.y = pivot.Get_Y_Translation();
3318 techOffset.z = pivot.Get_Z_Translation();
3319 }
3320#endif
3321
3322 CRCDEBUG_LOG(("wslot = %d\n", wslot));
3323 const ModelConditionInfo::WeaponBarrelInfoVec& wbvec = stateToUse->m_weaponBarrelInfoVec[wslot];
3324 if( wbvec.empty() )
3325 {
3326 // Can't find the launch pos, but they might still want the other info they asked for
3327 CRCDEBUG_LOG(("empty wbvec\n"));
3328 //BONEPOS_LOG(("empty wbvec\n"));
3329 launchPos = NULL;
3330 }
3331 else
3332 {
3333 if (specificBarrelToUse < 0 || specificBarrelToUse >= wbvec.size())
3334 specificBarrelToUse = 0;
3335
3336 if (launchPos)
3337 {
3338 CRCDEBUG_LOG(("specificBarrelToUse = %d\n", specificBarrelToUse));
3339 *launchPos = wbvec[specificBarrelToUse].m_projectileOffsetMtx;
3340
3341 if (tur != TURRET_INVALID)
3342 {
3343 launchPos->Pre_Rotate_Z(stateToUse->m_turrets[tur].m_turretArtAngle);
3344 launchPos->Pre_Rotate_Y(-stateToUse->m_turrets[tur].m_turretArtPitch);
3345 }
3346#ifdef CACHE_ATTACH_BONE
3347#else
3348 launchPos->Adjust_Translation( Vector3( techOffset.x, techOffset.y, techOffset.z ) );
3349#endif
3350
3351 DUMPMATRIX3D(launchPos);
3352 }
3353 }
3354
3355 if (turretRotPos)
3356 turretRotPos->zero();
3357 if (turretPitchPos)
3358 turretPitchPos->zero();
3359
3360 if (tur != TURRET_INVALID)
3361 {
3362#ifdef CACHE_ATTACH_BONE
3363 const Vector3* offset = d->getAttachToDrawableBoneOffset(getDrawable());
3364#endif
3365 const ModelConditionInfo::TurretInfo& turInfo = stateToUse->m_turrets[tur];
3366 if (turretRotPos)
3367 {
3368 if (turInfo.m_turretAngleNameKey != NAMEKEY_INVALID &&
3369 !stateToUse->findPristineBonePos(turInfo.m_turretAngleNameKey, *turretRotPos))
3370 {
3371 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: TurretBone %s not found!\n",KEYNAME(turInfo.m_turretAngleNameKey).str()));
3372 }
3373#ifdef CACHE_ATTACH_BONE
3374 if (offset)
3375 {
3376 turretRotPos->x += offset->X;
3377 turretRotPos->y += offset->Y;
3378 turretRotPos->z += offset->Z;
3379 }
3380#endif
3381 }
3382 if (turretPitchPos)
3383 {
3384 if (turInfo.m_turretPitchNameKey != NAMEKEY_INVALID &&
3385 !stateToUse->findPristineBonePos(turInfo.m_turretPitchNameKey, *turretPitchPos))
3386 {
3387 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: TurretBone %s not found!\n",KEYNAME(turInfo.m_turretPitchNameKey).str()));
3388 }
3389#ifdef CACHE_ATTACH_BONE
3390 if (offset)
3391 {
3392 turretPitchPos->x += offset->X;
3393 turretPitchPos->y += offset->Y;
3394 turretPitchPos->z += offset->Z;
3395 }
3396#endif
3397 }
3398 }
3399 return launchPos != NULL;// return if LaunchPos is valid or not
3400}
3401
3402//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3403Int W3DModelDraw::getPristineBonePositionsForConditionState(
3404 const ModelConditionFlags& condition,
3405 const char* boneNamePrefix,
3406 Int startIndex,
3407 Coord3D* positions,
3408 Matrix3D* transforms,
3409 Int maxBones
3410) const
3411{
3412 /*
3413 Note, this recalcs the state every time, rather than using m_curState,
3414 because m_curState could be a transition state, and we really need
3415 to get the pristine bone(s) for the state that logic believes to be current,
3416 not the one the client might currently be using...
3417 */
3418 const ModelConditionInfo* stateToUse = findBestInfo(condition);
3419 if (!stateToUse)
3420 return 0;
3421
3422// if (isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff())
3423// {
3424// CRCDEBUG_LOG(("W3DModelDraw::getPristineBonePositionsForConditionState() - state = '%s'\n",
3425// stateToUse->getDescription().str()));
3426// //CRCDEBUG_LOG(("renderObject == NULL: %d\n", (stateToUse==m_curState)?(m_renderObject == NULL):1));
3427// }
3428
3429 //BONEPOS_LOG(("validateStuff() from within W3DModelDraw::getPristineBonePositionsForConditionState()\n"));
3430 //BONEPOS_DUMPREAL(getDrawable()->getScale());
3431 // we must call this every time we set m_nextState, to ensure cached bones are happy
3432 stateToUse->validateStuff(
3433 // if the state is the current state, pass in the current render object
3434 // so that we don't have to re-create it!
3435 stateToUse == m_curState ? m_renderObject : NULL,
3436 getDrawable()->getScale(),
3437 getW3DModelDrawModuleData()->m_extraPublicBones);
3438
3439 const int MAX_BONE_GET = 64;
3440 Matrix3D tmpMtx[MAX_BONE_GET];
3441
3442 if (maxBones > MAX_BONE_GET)
3443 maxBones = MAX_BONE_GET;
3444
3445 if (transforms == NULL)
3446 transforms = tmpMtx;
3447
3448 Int posCount = 0;
3449 Int endIndex = (startIndex == 0) ? 0 : 99;
3450 char buffer[256];
3451 for (Int i = startIndex; i <= endIndex; ++i)
3452 {
3453 if (i == 0)
3454 strcpy(buffer, boneNamePrefix);
3455 else
3456 sprintf(buffer, "%s%02d", boneNamePrefix, i);
3457
3458 for (char *c = buffer; c && *c; ++c)
3459 {
3460 // convert to all-lowercase since that's how we filled in the map
3461 *c = tolower(*c);
3462 }
3463
3464 const Matrix3D* mtx = stateToUse->findPristineBone(NAMEKEY(buffer), NULL);
3465 if (mtx)
3466 {
3467 transforms[posCount] = *mtx;
3468// if (isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff())
3469// {
3470// DUMPMATRIX3D(mtx);
3471// }
3472 }
3473 else
3474 {
3475 //DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: Bone %s not found!\n",buffer));
3476 const Object *obj = getDrawable()->getObject();
3477 if (obj)
3478 transforms[posCount] = *obj->getTransformMatrix();
3479 else
3480 transforms[posCount].Make_Identity();
3481 break;
3482 }
3483
3484 ++posCount;
3485 if (posCount >= maxBones)
3486 break;
3487 }
3488
3489 if (positions && transforms)
3490 {
3491 for (i = 0; i < posCount; ++i)
3492 {
3493 Vector3 pos = transforms[i].Get_Translation();
3494 positions[i].x = pos.X;
3495 positions[i].y = pos.Y;
3496 positions[i].z = pos.Z;
3497// if (isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff())
3498// {
3499// DUMPCOORD3D(&(positions[i]));
3500// }
3501 }
3502 }
3503
3504// if (isValidTimeToCalcLogicStuff())
3505// {
3506// CRCDEBUG_LOG(("end of W3DModelDraw::getPristineBonePositionsForConditionState()\n"));
3507// }
3508
3509 return posCount;
3510}

3514// (gth) C&C3 Added this accessor for the bounding box of a render object in a W3DModelDraw module
3515// this method must ONLY be called from the client, NEVER From the logic, not even indirectly.
3516Bool W3DModelDraw::clientOnly_getRenderObjBoundBox(OBBoxClass * boundbox) const
3517{
3518 if (!m_renderObject)
3519 return false;
3520
3521 AABoxClass aabox;
3522 m_renderObject->Get_Obj_Space_Bounding_Box(aabox);
3523
3524 Matrix3D tm = m_renderObject->Get_Transform();
3525
3526 // build an OBB for this AAB,transform
3527 OBBoxClass box0(aabox.Center,aabox.Extent);
3528 OBBoxClass::Transform(tm,box0,boundbox);
3529
3530 return true;
3531}

3534//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3535// (gth) C&C3 Added this accessor for a bone transform in the render object
3536// this method must ONLY be called from the client, NEVER From the logic, not even indirectly.
3537Bool W3DModelDraw::clientOnly_getRenderObjBoneTransform(const AsciiString & boneName,Matrix3D * set_tm) const
3538{
3539 if (!m_renderObject) {
3540 return false;
3541 }
3542
3543 int idx = m_renderObject->Get_Bone_Index(boneName.str());
3544 if (idx == 0) {
3545 set_tm->Make_Identity();
3546 return false;
3547 } else {
3548 *set_tm = m_renderObject->Get_Bone_Transform(idx);
3549 return true;
3550 }

3568//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3569Int W3DModelDraw::getCurrentBonePositions(
3570 const char* boneNamePrefix,
3571 Int startIndex,
3572 Coord3D* positions,
3573 Matrix3D* transforms,
3574 Int maxBones
3575) const
3576{
3577 const int MAX_BONE_GET = 64;
3578 Matrix3D tmpMtx[MAX_BONE_GET];
3579
3580 if (maxBones > MAX_BONE_GET)
3581 maxBones = MAX_BONE_GET;
3582
3583 if (transforms == NULL)
3584 transforms = tmpMtx;
3585
3586 if( !m_renderObject )
3587 return 0;
3588
3589 // ugh... kill the mtx so we get it in modelspace, not world space
3590 Matrix3D originalTransform = m_renderObject->Get_Transform(); // save the transform
3591// which is faster: slamming the xform (and invalidating the objects xforms)
3592// or inverting it ourself? gotta profile to see. (srj)
3593#define DO_INV
3594#ifdef DO_INV
3595 Matrix3D inverse;
3596 originalTransform.Get_Orthogonal_Inverse(inverse);
3597 inverse.Scale(getDrawable()->getScale());
3598#else
3599 Matrix3D tmp(true);
3600 tmp.Scale(getDrawable()->getScale());
3601 m_renderObject->Set_Transform(tmp); // set to identity transform
3602#endif
3603
3604 Int posCount = 0;
3605 Int endIndex = (startIndex == 0) ? 0 : 99;
3606 char buffer[256];
3607 for (Int i = startIndex; i <= endIndex; ++i)
3608 {
3609 if (i == 0)
3610 strcpy(buffer, boneNamePrefix);
3611 else
3612 sprintf(buffer, "%s%02d", boneNamePrefix, i);
3613
3614 Int boneIndex = m_renderObject->Get_Bone_Index(buffer);
3615 if (boneIndex == 0)
3616 break;
3617
3618 transforms[posCount] = m_renderObject->Get_Bone_Transform(boneIndex);
3619#ifdef DO_INV
3620 transforms[posCount].preMul(inverse);
3621#endif
3622 //DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(!m_renderObject->Is_Bone_Captured(boneIndex), ("bone is captured!"));
3623
3624 ++posCount;
3625 if (posCount >= maxBones)
3626 break;
3627 }
3628
3629 if (positions && transforms)
3630 {
3631 for (i = 0; i < posCount; ++i)
3632 {
3633 Vector3 pos = transforms[i].Get_Translation();
3634 positions[i].x = pos.X;
3635 positions[i].y = pos.Y;
3636 positions[i].z = pos.Z;
3637 }
3638 }
3639
3640#ifdef DO_INV
3641#else
3642 m_renderObject->Set_Transform(originalTransform); // restore it
3643#endif
3644
3645 return posCount;
3646}

3648//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3649void W3DModelDraw::reactToTransformChange( const Matrix3D* oldMtx,
3650 const Coord3D* oldPos,
3651 Real oldAngle )
3652{
3653
3654 // set the position of our render object
3655 if( m_renderObject )
3656 {
3657 Matrix3D mtx = *getDrawable()->getTransformMatrix();
3658 adjustTransformMtx(mtx);
3659 m_renderObject->Set_Transform(mtx);
3660 }
3661
3662 if (m_trackRenderObject)
3663 {
3664 Object *obj = getDrawable()->getObject();
3665 const Coord3D* pos = getDrawable()->getPosition();
3666
3667 if ( m_fullyObscuredByShroud || obj->testStatus( OBJECT_STATUS_STEALTHED ) == TRUE )
3668 {
3669 m_trackRenderObject->addCapEdgeToTrack(pos->x, pos->y);
3670 }
3671 else
3672 {
3673 if (obj && obj->isSignificantlyAboveTerrain())
3674 {
3675 m_trackRenderObject->setAirborne();
3676 }
3677 m_trackRenderObject->addEdgeToTrack(pos->x, pos->y);
3678 }
3679 }
3680}

3695//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3696Bool W3DModelDraw::handleWeaponFireFX(WeaponSlotType wslot, Int specificBarrelToUse, const FXList* fxl, Real weaponSpeed, const Coord3D* victimPos, Real damageRadius)
3697{
3698 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(specificBarrelToUse >= 0, ("specificBarrelToUse should now always be explicit"));
3699
3700 if (!m_curState || !(m_curState->m_validStuff & ModelConditionInfo::BARRELS_VALID))
3701 return false;
3702
3703 const ModelConditionInfo::WeaponBarrelInfoVec& wbvec = m_curState->m_weaponBarrelInfoVec[wslot];
3704 if (wbvec.empty())
3705 {
3706 // don't do this... some other module of our drawable may have handled it.
3707 // just return false and let the caller sort it out.
3708 // FXList::doFXPos(fxl, getDrawable()->getPosition(), getDrawable()->getTransformMatrix(), weaponSpeed, victimPos);
3709 return false;
3710 }
3711
3712 Bool handled = false;
3713
3714 if (specificBarrelToUse < 0 || specificBarrelToUse > wbvec.size())
3715 specificBarrelToUse = 0;
3716
3717 const ModelConditionInfo::WeaponBarrelInfo& info = wbvec[specificBarrelToUse];
3718
3719 if (fxl)
3720 {
3721 if (info.m_fxBone && m_renderObject)
3722 {
3723 const Object *logicObject = getDrawable()->getObject();// This is slow, so store it
3724 if( ! m_renderObject->Is_Hidden() || (logicObject == NULL) )
3725 {
3726 // I can ask the drawable's bone position if I am not hidden (if I have no object I have no choice)
3727 Matrix3D mtx = m_renderObject->Get_Bone_Transform(info.m_fxBone);
3728 Coord3D pos;
3729 pos.x = mtx.Get_X_Translation();
3730 pos.y = mtx.Get_Y_Translation();
3731 pos.z = mtx.Get_Z_Translation();
3732 FXList::doFXPos(fxl, &pos, &mtx, weaponSpeed, victimPos, damageRadius);
3733 }
3734 else
3735 {
3736 // Else, I should just use my logic position for the effect placement.
3737 // Things in transports regularly fire from inside (hidden), so this is not weird.
3738 const Matrix3D *mtx;
3739 Coord3D pos;
3740 mtx = logicObject->getTransformMatrix();
3741 pos = *(logicObject->getPosition());
3747 FXList::doFXPos(fxl, &pos, mtx, weaponSpeed, victimPos, damageRadius);
3748 }
3749
3750 handled = true;
3751 }
3752 else
3753 {
3754 DEBUG_LOG(("*** no FXBone found for a non-null FXL\n"));
3755 }
3756 }
3757
3758 if (info.m_recoilBone || info.m_muzzleFlashBone)
3759 {
3760 //DEBUG_LOG(("START muzzleflash %08lx for Draw %08lx state %s at frame %d\n",info.m_muzzleFlashBone,this,m_curState->m_description.str(),TheGameLogic->getFrame()));
3761 WeaponRecoilInfo& recoil = m_weaponRecoilInfoVec[wslot][specificBarrelToUse];
3762 recoil.m_state = WeaponRecoilInfo::RECOIL_START;
3763 recoil.m_recoilRate = getW3DModelDrawModuleData()->m_initialRecoil;
3764 if (info.m_muzzleFlashBone != 0)
3765 info.setMuzzleFlashHidden(m_renderObject, false);
3766 }
3767
3768 return handled;
3769}

3771//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3772void W3DModelDraw::setAnimationLoopDuration(UnsignedInt numFrames)
3773{
3774// this is never defined -- srj
3775#ifdef NO_DURATIONS_ON_TRANSITIONS
3776 if (m_curState != NULL && m_curState->m_transition != NO_TRANSITION &&
3777 m_nextState != NULL && m_nextState->m_transition == NO_TRANSITION)
3778 {
3779 DEBUG_LOG(("deferring pending duration of %d frames\n",numFrames));
3780 m_nextStateAnimLoopDuration = numFrames;
3781 return;
3782 }
3783
3784 m_nextStateAnimLoopDuration = NO_NEXT_DURATION;
3785 DEBUG_ASSERTCRASH(m_curState != NULL && m_curState->m_transition == NO_TRANSITION, ("Hmm, setAnimationLoopDuration on a transition state is probably not right... see srj"));
3786#else
3787 m_nextStateAnimLoopDuration = NO_NEXT_DURATION;
3788#endif
3789 Real desiredDurationInMsec = ceilf(numFrames * MSEC_PER_LOGICFRAME_REAL);
3790 setCurAnimDurationInMsec(desiredDurationInMsec);
3791}
3792
3793//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3799void W3DModelDraw::setAnimationCompletionTime(UnsignedInt numFrames)
3800{
3801 if (m_curState != NULL && m_curState->m_transitionSig != NO_TRANSITION && m_curState->m_animations.size() > 0 &&
3802 m_nextState != NULL && m_nextState->m_transitionSig == NO_TRANSITION && m_nextState->m_animations.size() > 0)
3803 {
3804 // we have a transition; split up the time suitably.
3805 // note that this is just a guess, and assumes that the states
3806 // have only one anim each (or, if multiple, that they are
3807 // all pretty close in natural duration)
3808 const Real t1 = m_curState->m_animations.front().getNaturalDurationInMsec();
3809 const Real t2 = m_nextState->m_animations.front().getNaturalDurationInMsec();
3810 UnsignedInt transTime = REAL_TO_INT_FLOOR((numFrames * t1) / (t1 + t2));
3811 setAnimationLoopDuration(transTime);
3812 m_nextStateAnimLoopDuration = numFrames - transTime;
3813 }
3814 else
3815 {
3816 setAnimationLoopDuration(numFrames);
3817 }
3818}
3819
3820//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3821void W3DModelDraw::setAnimationFrame( int frame )
3822{
3823 if( m_renderObject && m_whichAnimInCurState >= 0 )
3824 {
3825 const W3DAnimationInfo& animInfo = m_curState->m_animations[ m_whichAnimInCurState ];
3826 HAnimClass* animHandle = animInfo.getAnimHandle(); // note that this now returns an ADDREFED handle, which must be released by the caller!
3827 m_renderObject->Set_Animation( animHandle, frame );
3828 REF_PTR_RELEASE(animHandle);
3829 }
3830}
3831
3832//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3833void W3DModelDraw::setPauseAnimation(Bool pauseAnim)
3834{
3835 if (m_pauseAnimation == pauseAnim)
3836 {
3837 return;
3838 }
3839
3840 m_pauseAnimation = pauseAnim;
3841
3842 if (m_renderObject && m_renderObject->Class_ID() == RenderObjClass::CLASSID_HLOD)
3843 {
3844 float framenum, dummy;
3845 int mode, numFrames;
3846
3847 HLodClass* hlod = (HLodClass*)m_renderObject;
3848 HAnimClass* anim = hlod->Peek_Animation_And_Info(framenum, numFrames, mode, dummy);
3849 if (anim)
3850 {
3851 if (m_pauseAnimation)
3852 {
3853 m_animationMode = mode;
3854 hlod->Set_Animation(anim, framenum, RenderObjClass::ANIM_MODE_MANUAL);
3855 }
3856 else
3857 {
3858 hlod->Set_Animation(anim, framenum, m_animationMode);
3859 }
3860 }
3861 }
3862}

3873//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3874void W3DModelDraw::rebuildWeaponRecoilInfo(const ModelConditionInfo* state)
3875{
3876 Int wslot;
3877
3878 if (state == NULL)
3879 {
3880 for (wslot = 0; wslot < WEAPONSLOT_COUNT; ++wslot)
3881 {
3882 m_weaponRecoilInfoVec[wslot].clear();
3883 }
3884 }
3885 else
3886 {
3887 for (wslot = 0; wslot < WEAPONSLOT_COUNT; ++wslot)
3888 {
3889 Int ncount = state->m_weaponBarrelInfoVec[wslot].size();
3890 if (m_weaponRecoilInfoVec[wslot].size() != ncount)
3891 {
3892 WeaponRecoilInfo tmp;
3893 m_weaponRecoilInfoVec[wslot].resize(ncount, tmp);
3894 }
3895
3896 for (WeaponRecoilInfoVec::iterator it = m_weaponRecoilInfoVec[wslot].begin(); it != m_weaponRecoilInfoVec[wslot].end(); ++it)
3897 {
3898 it->clear();
3899 }
3900 }
3901 }
3902}

3944//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3945void W3DModelDraw::doHideShowProjectileObjects( UnsignedInt showCount, UnsignedInt maxCount, WeaponSlotType slot )
3946{
3947 // Loop through the projectile bones, and start hiding off the front. That is, 8,9 means to hide the first only.
3948 if (maxCount < showCount)
3949 {
3950 DEBUG_CRASH(("Someone is trying to show more projectiles than they have.") );
3951 return;
3952 }
3953 Int hideCount = maxCount - showCount;
3954
3955 std::vector<ModelConditionInfo::HideShowSubObjInfo> showHideVector;
3956 ModelConditionInfo::HideShowSubObjInfo oneEntry;
3957 if (m_curState->m_weaponProjectileHideShowName[slot].isEmpty())
3958 {
3959 for( Int projectileIndex = 0; projectileIndex < maxCount; projectileIndex++ )
3960 {
3961 oneEntry.subObjName.format("%s%02d", m_curState->m_weaponProjectileLaunchBoneName[slot].str(), (projectileIndex + 1));
3962 oneEntry.hide = ((projectileIndex + 1) <= hideCount);
3963 showHideVector.push_back( oneEntry );
3964 }
3965 }
3966 else
3967 {
3968 oneEntry.subObjName = m_curState->m_weaponProjectileHideShowName[slot];
3969 oneEntry.hide = (0 < hideCount);
3970 showHideVector.push_back( oneEntry );
3971 }
3972
3973 // Rather than duplicate recursive utility stuff, I will build a vector like those used by the main ShowHide setting
3974 doHideShowSubObjs(&showHideVector);
3975}
3976
3977//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3978void W3DModelDraw::updateSubObjects()
3979{
3980 if (!m_renderObject)
3981 return;
3982
3983 if (!m_subObjectVec.empty())
3984 {
3985 for (std::vector<ModelConditionInfo::HideShowSubObjInfo>::const_iterator it = m_subObjectVec.begin(); it != m_subObjectVec.end(); ++it)
3986 {
3987 Int objIndex;
3988 RenderObjClass* subObj;
3989
3990 if ((subObj = m_renderObject->Get_Sub_Object_By_Name(it->subObjName.str(), &objIndex)) != NULL)
3991 {
3992 subObj->Set_Hidden(it->hide);
3993
3994 const HTreeClass *htree = m_renderObject->Get_HTree();
3995 if (htree)
3996 {
3997 //get the bone of this subobject so we can hide all other child objects that use this bone
3998 //as a parent.
3999 Int boneIdx = m_renderObject->Get_Sub_Object_Bone_Index(0, objIndex);
4000 doHideShowBoneSubObjs( it->hide, m_renderObject->Get_Num_Sub_Objects(), boneIdx, m_renderObject, htree);
4001 }
4002 subObj->Release_Ref();
4003 }
4004 else
4005 {
4006 DEBUG_CRASH(("*** ASSET ERROR: SubObject %s not found (%s)!\n",it->subObjName.str(),getDrawable()->getTemplate()->getName().str()));
4007 }
4008 }
4009 }
4010}

4023// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4029// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4030void W3DModelDraw::xfer( Xfer *xfer )
4031{
4032
4033 // version
4034 const XferVersion currentVersion = 2;
4035 XferVersion version = currentVersion;
4036 xfer->xferVersion( &version, currentVersion );
4037
4038 // extend base class
4039 DrawModule::xfer( xfer );
4040
4041 // weapon recoil info vectors
4042 UnsignedByte recoilInfoCount;
4043 WeaponRecoilInfo weaponRecoilInfo;
4044 for( Int i = 0; i < WEAPONSLOT_COUNT; ++i )
4045 {
4046
4047 // count of data here
4048 recoilInfoCount = m_weaponRecoilInfoVec[ i ].size();
4049 xfer->xferUnsignedByte( &recoilInfoCount );
4050 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_SAVE )
4051 {
4052
4053 WeaponRecoilInfoVec::const_iterator it;
4054 for( it = m_weaponRecoilInfoVec[ i ].begin(); it != m_weaponRecoilInfoVec[ i ].end(); ++it )
4055 {
4056
4057 // state
4058 weaponRecoilInfo.m_state = (*it).m_state;
4059 xfer->xferUser( &weaponRecoilInfo.m_state, sizeof( WeaponRecoilInfo::RecoilState ) );
4060
4061 // shift
4062 weaponRecoilInfo.m_shift = (*it).m_shift;
4063 xfer->xferReal( &weaponRecoilInfo.m_shift );
4064
4065 // recoil rate
4066 weaponRecoilInfo.m_recoilRate = (*it).m_recoilRate;
4067 xfer->xferReal( &weaponRecoilInfo.m_recoilRate );
4068
4069 } // end for, it
4070
4071 } // end if, save
4072 else
4073 {
4074
4075 // clear this list before loading
4076 m_weaponRecoilInfoVec[ i ].clear();
4077
4078 // read each data item
4079 for( Int j = 0; j < recoilInfoCount; ++j )
4080 {
4081
4082 // read state
4083 xfer->xferUser( &weaponRecoilInfo.m_state, sizeof( WeaponRecoilInfo::RecoilState ) );
4084
4085 // read shift
4086 xfer->xferReal( &weaponRecoilInfo.m_shift );
4087
4088 // read recoil rate
4089 xfer->xferReal( &weaponRecoilInfo.m_recoilRate );
4090
4091 // stuff it in the vector
4092 m_weaponRecoilInfoVec[ i ].push_back( weaponRecoilInfo );
4093
4094 } // end for, j
4095
4096 } // end else, load
4097
4098 } // end for, i
4099
4100 // sub object vector
4101 UnsignedByte subObjectCount = m_subObjectVec.size();
4102 xfer->xferUnsignedByte( &subObjectCount );
4103 ModelConditionInfo::HideShowSubObjInfo hideShowSubObjInfo;
4104 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_SAVE )
4105 {
4106
4107 std::vector<ModelConditionInfo::HideShowSubObjInfo>::const_iterator it;
4108 for( it = m_subObjectVec.begin(); it != m_subObjectVec.end(); ++it )
4109 {
4110
4111 // sub object name
4112 hideShowSubObjInfo.subObjName = (*it).subObjName;
4113 xfer->xferAsciiString( &hideShowSubObjInfo.subObjName );
4114
4115 // hide
4116 hideShowSubObjInfo.hide = (*it).hide;
4117 xfer->xferBool( &hideShowSubObjInfo.hide );
4118
4119 } // end for, it
4120
4121 } // end if, save
4122 else
4123 {
4124
4125 // the vector must be emtpy
4126 m_subObjectVec.clear();
4127
4128 // read each data item
4129 for( UnsignedByte i = 0; i < subObjectCount; ++i )
4130 {
4131
4132 // name
4133 xfer->xferAsciiString( &hideShowSubObjInfo.subObjName );
4134
4135 // hide
4136 xfer->xferBool( &hideShowSubObjInfo.hide );
4137
4138 // stuff in vector
4139 m_subObjectVec.push_back( hideShowSubObjInfo );
4140
4141 } // end for, i
4142
4143 } // end else, load
4144
4145 // animation
4146 if( version >= 2 )
4147 {
4148
4149 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_SAVE )
4150 {
4151 // srj sez: don't save info for transition states, since we can't really
4152 // restore them effectively.
4153 if ( m_renderObject
4154 && m_renderObject->Class_ID() == RenderObjClass::CLASSID_HLOD
4155 && m_curState
4156 && m_curState->m_transitionSig == NO_TRANSITION )
4157 {
4158
4159 // cast to HLod
4160 HLodClass *hlod = (HLodClass*)m_renderObject;
4161
4162 // get animation info
4163 Int mode, numFrames;
4164 Real frame, dummy;
4165 HAnimClass *anim = hlod->Peek_Animation_And_Info( frame, numFrames, mode, dummy );
4166
4167 // animation data is present
4168 Bool present = anim ? TRUE : FALSE;
4169 xfer->xferBool( &present );
4170
4171 // if animation data is present
4172 if( anim )
4173 {
4174
4175 // xfer mode
4176 xfer->xferInt( &mode );
4177
4178 //
4179 // xfer frame as a fraction (this will allow the animations to change
4180 // in future patches but will still be mostly correct)
4181 //
4182 Real percent = frame / INT_TO_REAL( anim->Get_Num_Frames()-1 );
4183 xfer->xferReal( &percent );
4184
4185 } // end if, anim
4186
4187 } // end if
4188 else
4189 {
4190
4191 // animation data is *NOT* present
4192 Bool present = FALSE;
4193 xfer->xferBool( &present );
4194
4195 } // end else
4196
4197 } // end if, save
4198 else
4199 {
4200
4201 // read animation present flag
4202 Bool present;
4203 xfer->xferBool( &present );
4204
4205 if( present )
4206 {
4207
4208 {
4209 // read mode
4210 Int mode;
4211 xfer->xferInt( &mode ); // note, this will be ignored
4212 }
4213
4214 // read percent
4215 Real percent;
4216 xfer->xferReal( &percent );
4217
4218 //
4219 // cast render object to HLod, if this is no longer possible we have read the
4220 // data already and can just ignore it
4221 //
4222 if( m_renderObject && m_renderObject->Class_ID() == RenderObjClass::CLASSID_HLOD )
4223 {
4224 HLodClass *hlod = (HLodClass *)m_renderObject;
4225
4226 // get anim
4227 HAnimClass *anim = hlod->Peek_Animation();
4228
4229 // set animation data
4230 if( anim )
4231 {
4232
4233 // figure out frame number given percent written in file and total frames on anim
4234 Real frame = percent * INT_TO_REAL( anim->Get_Num_Frames()-1 );
4235
4236 float dummy1, dummy2;
4237 int curMode, dummy3;
4238 hlod->Peek_Animation_And_Info(dummy1, dummy3, curMode, dummy2);
4239
4240 // srj sez: do not change the animation mode. it's too risky, since if you change (say) a nonlooping
4241 // to a looping, something might break since it could rely on that anim terminating.
4242
4243 // set animation data
4244 hlod->Set_Animation( anim, frame, curMode );
4245
4246 } // end if, anim
4247
4248 } // end if
4249
4250 } // end if
4251
4252 } // end else, load
4253
4254 } // end if, version with animation info
4255
4256 // when loading, update the sub objects if we have any
4257 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_LOAD && m_subObjectVec.empty() == FALSE )
4258 updateSubObjects();
4259
4260} // end xfer

4281
4282// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4283void W3DModelDrawModuleData::xfer( Xfer *x )
4284{
4285
4286 // version
4287 const XferVersion currentVersion = 1;
4288 XferVersion version = currentVersion;
4289 x->xferVersion( &version, currentVersion );
4290
4291 for (ModelConditionVector::iterator it = m_conditionStates.begin(); it != m_conditionStates.end(); ++it)
4292 {
4293 ModelConditionInfo *info = &(*it);
4294 x->xferByte(&(info->m_validStuff));
4295#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
4296 x->xferAsciiString(&(info->m_description));
4297#endif
4298 if (info->m_validStuff)
4299 {
4300 for (PristineBoneInfoMap::iterator bit = info->m_pristineBones.begin(); bit != info->m_pristineBones.end(); ++bit)
4301 {
4302 PristineBoneInfo *bone = &(bit->second);
4303 x->xferInt(&(bone->boneIndex));
4304 x->xferUser(&(bone->mtx), sizeof(Matrix3D));
4305 }
4306 for (Int i=0; i<MAX_TURRETS; ++i)
4307 {
4308 x->xferInt(&(info->m_turrets[i].m_turretAngleBone));
4309 x->xferInt(&(info->m_turrets[i].m_turretPitchBone));
4310 }
4311 for (i=0; i<WEAPONSLOT_COUNT; ++i)
4312 {
4313 for (ModelConditionInfo::WeaponBarrelInfoVec::iterator wit = info->m_weaponBarrelInfoVec[i].begin(); wit != info->m_weaponBarrelInfoVec[i].end(); ++wit)
4314 {
4315 x->xferUser(&(wit->m_projectileOffsetMtx), sizeof(Matrix3D));
4316 }
4317 }
4318 }
4319 }
4320}
